Name: Vicky El
Comments: This app is not quite perfect but is probably the best among the options with the many features that it offers. The response time is decent, if you have good signal and WiFi connection. Some issues may have something to do with the wireless infrastructure, not necessarily Grab's. One example is paying with a foreign credit card. you need to give yourself time or try getting a local SIM or use portable pocket WiFi.

Name: Howard Clerf
Comments: This app used to work very well, but after the last update we have had several problems. 1st problem is that it will not allow me to pay for a Grab Unlimited subscription, but it will tell me on each ride how much I could save by subscribing. 2nd problem happened today. Says I need to pay for my last ride, but my cc has been charged and I received a receipt by email. Now I can't get a live agent to resolve a credit card issue!

Name: Olya Noskova
Comments: Grab sucks. The app sucks. I made 2 orders, the restaurants didn't accept them, but I have to wait for the system to cancel them. Once I waited 1.5 hours!!! Make a chat with the restaurant or your agent to quickly resolve these issues, instead of waiting until it becomes known after 1.5-2 hours that the restaurant is long closed. The support sucks. The same problem with taxi.

Name: Hyacinth Jimenez
Comments: This app is frustrating to use and not very user intuitive. After you have ordered a car, it is impossible to zoom in on your pick up location to check your own location in reference to it. There are an annoying amount of notifications. Using it because I'm overseas and this is one of the most used ride share apps where I am.

Name: Adrian N
Comments: New review: Grab express is useless. You pay more for same day shipping, yet package was never delivered and the driver couldn't be contacted. Low quality drivers is aplenty. Old review: Practically useless. You can wait for hours, but there will be no drivers picking up despite there are plenty of car icons on the map. What's the point of this app again? Lately, I never able to book every time I tried this app.

Name: Brandon Peh
Comments: Amazing app design. Keeps giving me cars who are 20-30 minutes away, and then when I cancel because it keeps doing the same thing 4 times in a row, I get locked out for 24 hours. Such a great thing to see when I urgently need to get somewhere and have no other options. As a Platinum user, I'm telling you, don't use this app. Also wow thanks for having the UI take up more than half the screen so that if I want to zoom in on the map I can only use the top 1/3 of my screen.

Name: Tino
Comments: Great to find a ride, careful with adding your credit card. After adding my credit card, I was immediately charged rides that I never made. I always paid rides in cash before. On the next ride the driver overcharged me and I had to contact support. Make sure to note the fare on the meter or don't add a credit card. Support resolved all issues within a few days, it was just an unnecessary waste of time. Updated from 3 to 1 star because I'm constantly being overcharged and it's annoying.

Name: Tuan-Ngoc Phan
Comments: I used to use this app a lot but recently the experience has gone downhill. Price increase and the absolute lack of customer support. If anything happens to your delivery (delay, no driver, etc.) they will make you wait for a long time and refuse to let you cancel your order and get your food from elsewhere. What's worse is that you can't talk to a human customer support and they will keep sending you in loops through useless FAQ pages that don't solve your problem.

Name: Èü¶ÊñØÂà©
Comments: Charges for leaving you standing in the rain. No way to contact customer service. No communication whatsoever. Food delivery service is no better. once you order, you can't cancel, even if it takes forty minutes for a driver to respond. The app won't cancel the order when there are no drivers. It won't allow you to cancel either. The drivers say they can't cancel the order either. Grab has become a straight up scam.
Developer_Reply: Grab lu√¥n t√¨m c√°ch c·∫£i thi·ªán tr·∫£i nghi·ªám c·ªßa b·∫°n m·ªôt c√°ch t·ªët nh·∫•t üôáüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è N·∫øu c√≥ b·∫•t k·ª≥ s·ª± c·ªë c·ª• th·ªÉ n√†o Grab c√≥ th·ªÉ ki·ªÉm tra cho b·∫°n. H√£y cho Grab bi·∫øt b·∫±ng c√°ch li√™n h·ªá qua Facebook: http://m.me/GrabVN nha ‚ú® Grab r·∫•t vui khi c√≥ th·ªÉ nh·∫≠n ƒë∆∞·ª£c l·∫°i 5 sao t·ª´ b·∫°n ü•∞ - Harry.

Name: Blaise Vitale
Comments: I installed this app and went through all of the verification steps prior to arriving in Singapore. My travel agent had recommended this app even though a local tour guide recommended a rival app - Tada. When I went ahead and booked a ride, the app worked fine. However, the driver made me pay in cash, and my credit card was charged again! Grab has not responded to my concern. I have a perfect 5.0 passenger rating with Uber. I don't want to use this service again!

Name: Joan Cordero
Comments: My order was cancelled after more than 30 minutes, but my card was still charged the whole amount. The Help Centre chat can't address my issue due to automated replies. I tried to call the hotline but it's a wrong number. It's so frustrating that you're so fast in debiting money from a buyer's bank account even before he/she gets the food/product, but when the delivery is cancelled, you're so slow to process the refund/reimbursement or worst, you're out of reach/can't be contacted immediately.

Name: L O
Comments: Been trying to resolve a payment issue FOR WEEKS. Can't use grab any longer because of some payment issue on their side. I've paid for grab unlimited and still can't order. I guess Grab has made it clear that they no longer want money from the service fees they would collect from my delivery and rides. I guess I'll move on to other apps that don't have all these recurring payment issues.

Name: Carl Robin Berdan
Comments: Time of pandemic, this was a great app but now from adding Grab Unlimited to losing Grabpoints for every purchase, now you can't even contact the restaurant or the driver to not being able to cancel despite just recently booked for the delivery and want to change address. They also automatically cancel your order if there's no delivery driver. You can't even talk to human agent anymore for the situation to be addressed. This app truly lost its respect for its customer as time goes on.
Developer_Reply: We regret hearing about this üòû Please reach out to us via the Help Centre or through our social media platforms so that we can review your concern further and take action. Thank you üôèÔ∏è

Name: M Advocate
Comments: I was hesitant about using this app because of all the sudden 1 star reviews. I've had no problem with using the service for a ride. Expect to bring exact amount as the rider may not have change. I can't speak on how payments other than cash factor in. I particularly enjoy the audio recording part of the safety feature. This app may have been even better in the past but it's made my life easier. You need a valid phone number to register.

Name: Fuyu Melon
Comments: Ordering food because I don't have time to go out and would rather not go out, so the "pick up point" that requires customers to get the order from the road becomes counterproductive - especially because their map is outdated/does not recognize roads that are there, the pick up points are by the highways which requires customers to walk great distances which is unnecessary since a lot of places are very accessible to vehicles. Deliveries but customers are the one who needs to walk? idk man.

Name: Jason Ramsey
Comments: The app cannot competently handle simple operations like food delivery. It keeps switching the pick up and destination points. It asks you to "conform" your pick up/ destination after you have already selected them (why!? I just selected it) and when you do it again changes your pick up/ destination points. It takes multiple attempts every time to do something that should be so simple. Stupid app

Name: Siti Khadijah Muhamad Farid
Comments: This app got a problem. I'm pretty sure the only reason I didn't get much mistake is because the drivers were experienced in this matter and know layouts to get to my university destination. But it's a problem for new drivers, and one of them was mad at me in return because of this mistake! Like, I already put the address and the pin on the map changed. It also changed from the intended spot to another one when I make sure to pin the correct place! It's not happened once, nor twice or thrice.
Developer_Reply: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at http://m.me/Grab so that we can follow up.

Name: Lou Park
Comments: Disgustingly annoying to use. Mapping is laughably inaccurate, and attempting to put the actual location resulted in the app thinking I was somewhere else. Everything is unneccessarily laggy, especially the map. Telephone calls tend to be extremely quiet. Also plays music when device is sleeping, which is annoying. At the very least the drivers were decent enough, but they do not excuse the app's poor behaviour.

Name: ◊î◊ì◊® ◊û◊ê◊ï◊®
Comments: Pretty bad app: Time for arrival (taxi) always wrong. UI is terrible and super loaded on the screen (too much info and data) Self location does not work for me, so every time I need to compare to Google maps to find my location. Location generally in this app isn't so good.. If you order food and the restaurant didn't really accepted it - you will wait 1.5 hours till it's cancelled. You cannot add more money manually for taxis if you are in a rush/no taxi will take the price. And more and more.

Name: Azura Schet
Comments: It doesn't focus on doing what the services are supposed to be anymore. It is so monetized, if you want your driver to arrive fast and not lounging around, actually doing their job and focus on one food destination delivery?? More money on top of usually delivery rate. Delivery fee, order fee, inl. tax, packaging charge, parking fee, toll fee, on top of up double or triple price from the actual restaurant. It doesn't make sense. The vouchers don't help much too

Name: David Walsh
Comments: It's not nearly as intuitive as Uber. For example, no zooming in, distance from driver invariably wrong. I also could not get a grab for nearly an hour in Bangkok, and as it scrolled another taxi driver came which I took advantage of - it couldn't cancel pending. Also...what is this foreign payment fee. How many ways do they like to scam us. UK should do this back.

Name: Zythus07
Comments: Somewhat reliable in the provinces. However it has one big problem: if you try to cancel a ride, the app doesn't honor the cancellation request and tries to fulfill the cancelled order anyway without you knowing. This leads to complicated situations where I think there's no grab driver in the area, cancel, book a ride on a different app, and then I have two taxis coming to pick me up at the same time. This has happened to me a few times now.
Developer_Reply: Grab r·∫•t ti·∫øc khi bi·∫øt ƒë∆∞·ª£c tr·∫£i nghi·ªám c·ªßa b·∫°n ch∆∞a ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·ªët khi s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ·ª©ng d·ª•ng üò• N·∫øu c√≥ ƒëi·ªÅu chi b·∫•t ti·ªán, mong b·∫°n chia s·∫ª v·ªõi Grab qua trang Facebook https://m.me/GrabVN/ ƒë·ªÉ Grab ki·ªÉm tra v√† h·ªó tr·ª£ b·∫°n k·ªãp th·ªùi nha üíö Grab lu√¥n mong mu·ªën s·∫Ω nh·∫≠n l·∫°i ƒë∆∞·ª£c 5 sao t·ª´ b·∫°n ü•∞ - Alice.

Name: T S (T)
Comments: It actually works quite well. However, the ride prices are sometimes much higher than with other taxi apps. And in addition, I was repeatedly charged some high additional costs after the ride without my consent and without it being displayed beforehand. No other taxi app has done this. I consider that to be very close to fraud. Therefore, only one star from me.

Name: BT Chong
Comments: Frustrating much. Got log out from the app and have been trying to re-log in for the past 30 minutes and still unsuccessful. The error message keeps popping up that something went wrong and to try again. I managed to receive sms code but unable to proceed to next page to input. And this error is happening at a time where I need to travel to the airport to catch a flight!!!

Name: alvie Huit
Comments: Grab is extremely well organised in Malaysia. Many KL malls have well appointed pick up/drop off locations. The cars are clean, drivers tend to be friendly, helpful and personable, and most importantly they are reliable. I am so impressed. Tip: when using the service upon arriving into KLIA, pickup point for Grab is on Level 1. Just designate the door you wish to be picked up in front of and stand in front of it. As easy as that!

Name: √∂zge g√ºven
Comments: ATTENTION! My credit card info got stolen while using the grab app for transport. Just after using the app and paying by credit card, the exact same amount and then more is charged to my credit card for different types of transactions with a clear trend. The app is not secure enough to avoid scammers. I wrote to the help center about the issue. The only answer is they dont share info with other parties, and they will inform me about the investigation. I didn't hear back after a couple of days.

Name: Jennifer Cruz
Comments: The Help Center is practically useless. When I‚Äôve reached out with specific issues, I‚Äôm often met with automated responses or generic articles. It feels like I‚Äôm talking to a bot, not a real person who can help. I have a pin location issue that is particularly annoying. I‚Äôve had multiple instances where drivers claimed I pinned the wrong location, even though I simply searched for my address and selected it from the suggested options. This clearly points to a problem with Grab‚Äôs map system.

Name: Mei Yu Ong
Comments: Navigation on the application is now super horrible when you encounter issues that needs to be reported. It as if they did it on purpose. For something as simple as reporting on missing items has now taken me more than 3hours to get through when it used to be so simple. Live Chat doesn't work. Help Support doesn't work. No email provided if both doesn't work. No number to call. Sounds like they don't care if you loose a few bucks over missing food items.
Developer_Reply: Hi there, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced. This is not the service we aim to provide. Rest assured that we are reviewing further for improvement. Thank you for highlighting this to us and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.

Name: Dharrvesh Resh
Comments: It's always about purchasing grab unlimited, and in return, all my deliveries shows will be back soon. If I have to go pick up. What's the point ordering through here? The location also quite messed up. I pin a location and book ride. The driver is on another side. Hope this doesn't happen to anyone else. It's freaking expensive nowadays. All the time, high demand.

Name: HM Wong
Comments: Grab is dominant in SEA. With many different languages spoken across this region, the app's ability to translate different languages is not up to par. When ordering food, I still see writings that I'm not familiar with. Even after opting the language that I want, foreign writings continue to appear. This reduces the efficiency of the app. Grab should made the app display the language that I want when ordering food or choosing a destination. An update is needed!!!

Name: J N
Comments: Grab application is helpful, drivers are generally friendly. But Help Center AI is poor and not helpful, so customer service is definitely OUT! Trip rate using promo or registered package is NOT consistent. Also, Grab drivers can manipulate/change notification system as if they already arrived, but actually they're still on the way.. The map is slow and inaccurate in showing driver's location when pick up customer, sometimes not moving or jumping here n there

Name: 13666RAI
Comments: Splitting delivery is a dumb idea even dumber when you can't choose to opt out (edited into 1 star until you can choose to do split delivery or not). Finally fixing the auto translate (edit). NOW PLEASE Have a better map whenever i choose to pin in the map which grab map have no idea what the place is the pin suddenly move somewhere else. 4 star if those thing fixed. 5 if you have a better ui (edit).

Name: Mitchelle Barquilla
Comments: There was a time when I was just searching for a ride but did not actually want to book one. I cancelled it immediately when I notice the app was pushing through. After a while I was shocked when a rider called my number saying he arrived at my location, telling me I should pay for him for coming. Like what? I did not even clicked on the 'Book' button in the app. Grab should work on this one. It's a huge inconvenience, not just for the riders but as well as for their passengers.

Name: Tresha Enriquez
Comments: I know you guys are doing everything to protect customer-rider transactions to prevent scams, but this whole thing about not being able to cancel the order in the first 1 minute of booking is so inconveniencing. I wanted to cancel my order the first minute cause I noticed I wasn't able to include another item that I wanted, but I couldn't cancel because of this stupid system. I can't even talk to a live agent so that they can properly solve this issue. The bot is always redirecting me to FAQs.

Name: Junze
Comments: I had a very frustrating experience using Grab. I booked a ride, but the driver intentionally delayed picking me up. After waiting for a long time with no progress, I had no choice but to cancel the booking, which wasted a significant amount of my time. To make things worse, there was no clear option on the platform to report the driver‚Äôs behavior. When I tried booking another ride right after, I was shocked to see that the price had doubled, even though only 20 minutes had passed.

Name: IronGuy64
Comments: Pricing algorithm is very predatory. Sometimes you won't be able to find a driver, so you cancel and try rebooking only to find the price has doubled, sometimes even tripled. If I set the destination as my college, price would be around 25-60 but if I set it as the restaurant across the road the price drops to 15-20. Would 100% stop using if it wasn't for Grab's market domination which makes for other eHailing apps have significantly fewer drivers available.

Name: Anton Martin
Comments: The app has user friendly interface and relevance to what we usually need. However, my upset is towards their refund process. They should return the credit where it was deducted from. What they do is they put it to your grab wallet which is very annoying because they force you to use it on grab services. What if I can find other services outside grab and that was my only money? Users should also cancel freely when the wait time for order confirmation is more than 10 minutes. It'a such a drag.

Name: Myka Isabelle Engwa
Comments: Bad customer service. Driver cancelled my order twice already, each after almost 30 mins of waiting for a driver to accept. I've had plenty of similar experiences like these. Why do they allow drivers to accept an order only to have them cancel it a few minutes later?? It certainly doesn't help that their live agents are impossible to reach. Their automated chat not sucks and is not helpful at all.

Name: Andrea Jelena Bantola
Comments: I've had the most abysmal experience with their services. Not only does Grab not automatically cancel the order when the restaurant closes at random times, but even closed restaurants show up on the searches causing orders placed to go through but not get prepared by the restaurant at all. When you cancel an order once it's delayed, policy says it'll take up to a month to refund the money. I'd rather pay premium on a different app.

Name: Clario Johan
Comments: The good part they help you find your things dropped on the driver's car. The worst possbile part is the newest version use they own Grab Map, and the algorithm is perform highly inefficient and almost everytime the driver will be given worst possible route so that you will have to wait way more time to be picked up. Just use Google maps man. It is not innovative, just causing problem to everyone.

Name: Van
Comments: When getting a ride, the pickup location auto selects a location either across the street or 200 meters away. Trying to force the app to pickup where you are is actually impossible in some cases. You are forced to walk down the street 2024-03-16 Grab started adding a 3% charge for foreign credit cards. Total bs because they don't get charged extra. I'm switching to Food Panda

Name: L M (Harbinger-X)
Comments: WHAT IS WRONG WITH THE AUTO TRANSLATION FUNCTION THAT'S NOT ENGAGING 95% OF THE TIME NOW!?!‚Äã I'M‚Äãü§è CLOSE TO‚Äã NEVER USING THIS APP AGAIN AND SWITCHING TO FOOD PANDA! - Clearing all data and cache fixes the problem maybe 3% of the time w/ 1-2 orders then same thing! - Even the profile UI will change completely with auto-translate switch missing! Minimize app & quickly switch back, translation dissapears and won't work again with complete reinstall. Almost threw my phone at wall I'm so annoyed ü§¨

Name: N
Comments: Price are totally random and skyrocket at peak hours. The usability of the map is terrible as it jumps everytime I want to zoom. Same for the drivers location which doesn't renew properly and it's almost impossible to know when a driver will arrive. The navigation lacks as drivers often experience difficulties in finding the pickup. Waiting time is often too long. Uber/Bolt is by far better. Foreigners are discriminated in Malaysia as credit cards are charged more and GrabUnlimited not available

Name: Budy L
Comments: I would give 5 stars if only I had not had the traumatic experience being stranded on street side for almost an hour just because the driver wanted to chase points to get bonus. Even then the driver got away by cheating the system and the system left me without a chance to report his horrible doing. He contacted an insider person to get my order erased from the system without any trace, so that he didn't get penalty and could resume chasing points. Once erased, I couldn't report.

Name: Kerine Ho
Comments: This app is starting to suck as they're getting complacent. I recently placed a grab food order which I've failed to receive. My spouse even went down to the outlet to check whether the outlet received the order which they did not receive as well. Their back end service sucks when there's a problem. Hop over the Foodpanda as their after service support is superb as compared to Grab. I was asked to resolve the issue on my own apparently. Wow. And your reply is still to an autobot. Scammer.
Developer_Reply: We're really sorry to hear about your experience. This isn't the service we aim to provide for our users. Please reach out to our support team at http://m.me/Grab so we can sort this out for you.

Name: Athea Marie
Comments: Extremely disappointed with the customer service. As someone who uses international cards. I've been facing with a lot of problems with Grab lately. Although, i have a sufficient funds to cover everything. They keep rejecting my cards, and customer support doesn't answer any of my complaints. I've expected so much and ended up being disappointed. No help provide, none of my concerns are being answered. Live chats doesn't help either.

Name: maimai shomai
Comments: I've been using grab for years and I didn't have much to complain until they changed their policy. When it shows that the kitchen hasn't even started with my order I no longer have the option to cancel an order even though they haven't started making it yet and had been waiting for 30 minutes for it to start. I only end up either starving or buying another food and pay extra for my order that arrives VERY LATE when I say late I meant HOURS of waiting. Using GRAB more doesn't really give you alot

Name: Faisal Alaswer
Comments: 1. Discrimination against foreigners: even my bank account is linked to Grab, still this is not enough for them. All other ewallets can verify no issue. 2. Unreliable UI/UX: sometimes I close and open the app then payment options like corporate credit option is gone and they want to force me to pay with my grab credit or card/cash until I install the app again. 3. Many manipulate by company and its developers on delivery options and time estimation just to get more money, yet delivery is late.

Name: Ê°úÂ∑ªMEIKYUN
Comments: Everything is good until your order's got some phoblem. I don't know why they make it complicate about Contact Grab. You need to go through a lot of sections to find out that your phoblem isn't in the AI pre-install chat and it end up being back to the first question again and again as if there were no humans willing to be in this section. In the end if you found the way to cantact staff they make you pay for your call because yes, it's your phoblem not theirs. Feedback isn't main concern ig.

Name: David Cham
Comments: Worse experience using the app. Couldn't get any rider for food delivery, delayed my order for 1 hour and still couldn't get any driver. I had to cancel. Ordered transport. But the driver went to wrong place and grab just cancelled and because the driver cancelled after not being helpful in at least telling me where he was, I was charged with 4 dollars without using. I have been using grab for a while, but I'll recommend to just don't use it anymore.
Developer_Reply: We're really sorry to hear about your experience. Please reach out to our support team via the in-app help center or via Facebook at http://m.me/Grab so we can help resolve this for you.

Name: Adelyn Khoo
Comments: The experience on Grab has been really disappointing of late. The matching with the drivers are so far away, and often dropping off at a stop first, which means my waiting time can be more than 10 mins. I wasted 20 minutes trying to find a nearby grab <5 mins from my house to no avail. Went on CDG and found a taxi 4 mins away. HAHA. Joke's on me because I wasted so much time on a app that just sucks. üëéüëé We need more transport companies in Singapore because grab is unreliable.
Developer_Reply: We‚Äôre truly sorry for the frustrating experience. We‚Äôre working hard to improve driver availability and matching algorithms, and your feedback helps us focus on what matters most. For immediate help, please reach out to us on social media!

Name: Marija Drezgic
Comments: This is an extremely unreliable service. I have scheduled a ride to the airport with them for 6 AM in the morning and the car never showed up. They notified me at 6.15 AM that they can't find a driver and as a compensation they give me 10‚Ç¨ worth of points. Pathetic and ridiculous! Do not use this app if you need reliable service, othervise you may end up stranded, but hey with 10‚Ç¨ worth of points. Unfortunately not possible to give zero stars, so I'm giving one.

Name: jessica cartel
Comments: I hope gets heard. I'm not sure if it's only me but it has been a week already that everytime I book a ride it appears that a driver accepted my booking but then again, the vehicle is NOT moving at all. Tried booking again but it's the same. You'll end up cancelling multiple times just to be able to book a good one. Please have your system fixed. It's annoying! New issue for GRAB & MOVE IT. PRICE RANGE WERE TOO HIGH DUE TO YOUR SYSTEMS MAP THAT DOES NOT READ THE RIGHT ROUTE. NOT ONLY FOR GRAB

Name: Adam D
Comments: Out of all delivery and car sharing apps that exist, this is by far the worst one, Grab has the worst customer service - your orders get cancelled without a reason, sometimes even after 1 hour of waiting, however as a customer you dont have the cancellation option in most cases. The map for the car sharing is extremely user unfriendly, waiting times terrible. Worst by far is the non-existent customer service, the chat is almost never working, or uses stupid AI, avoid it if you can!

Name: Stefan
Comments: Terrible for travelling abroad: it does not allow you to pre-configure anything at home until you order first ride and then once you are stranded in a new country it throws all kind of KYC at you, including face scanning, which is not only privacy intrusive, but first and foremost it may take very long time - in my case I wasn't even able to complete it.

Name: trash panda
Comments: im pretty sure a good sum of the 5 star reviews are from bots. no one in malaysia would like this service: drivers abuse the system by not picking up lower fare riders so you need to select higher fares, if not, they cancel all the time. not to mention the average price has gone up exponentially since covid and basically doubled. this app is slowly becoming useful only for emergency situations.

Name: Calvin982
Comments: The most atrocious food delivery system. I order some food off the app as usual and usually by default, it is supposed to be set as 'delivery'. Suddenly when my food was ready, the system told me the food was ready to be picked up by MYSELF when i did not even select the self pickup function! The worst part is i can't even get in touch with a freaking human customer service!!!

Name: Jhingky Sayson
Comments: Can't recommend this app, expected too much at first. Longer delivery time than other delivery app. They prepare the food first before booking a rider, so what if there's no available rider? We need to wait more than the expected arrival time. Instead of waiting 55 minutes for standard arrival time it would take an hour or more. If you can't wait, no option to cancel. Not convenient at all. First time using this, but I'll be deleting this after. I'm not sure though for Grab taxi.

Name: Maje
Comments: Riders always want Gcash and take too hard to find. Understand that not everyone uses digital currency and can only pay in cash. Many times, food would arrive cold, even though I booked priority delivery. Edit: Seriously, this app needs to improve its ability in finding drivers faster. I'm further downgrading my rating to a one star because my order has been canceled too many times, especially whenever I order using cash on delivery. Do better Grab!
Developer_Reply: So sorry for this experience. Kindly complete the following webform, so we can further assist you with your concern: https://help.grab.com/passenger/en-ph/900005077643-I-have-an-issue-with-my-Priority-Delivery-order

Name: Joel Daniel
Comments: It was good and worked for a while. Then suddenly for no reason credit card payment for a long ride was not accepted. That's when I discovered there is no customer service department with which to rectify the situation. So if you use this app, make sure to carry enough cash in local currency to pay the fare

Name: Mervin Sim
Comments: After I experienced several horrible episodes with grab (driver no show, cancellations, extreme delays), I wanted to finally reach out. However I was brought around in circles by the automatic response chat. After 30mins of circling, I'm very sure nobody will ever see my messages and feedback I have entered in the chat. When I came here to give a review, I realised that I am not the only one. And I see that grab responses to these complaints WITH MORE AUTOMATED REPLIES!! How very dissapointed...
Developer_Reply: Hi there, we are working towards making this better and always looking to improve your experience. For further check on your concern, we would appreciate it if you could send us the details at http://m.me/Grab , this will help us to continuously improve and to ensure better service in the future.

Name: Koh Liangming
Comments: Afew time when midnight I grab taxi, I was overcharge to the maximum price. Hence subsequently I started to take receipt. However, today was the first time I was told that they are not allow to issue receipt. Which is weird, if it wasn't base on meter, with platform charges. Then why put a range? Might as well just fix the price. It does not sounds right at all. This have happens again on the today 29 Nov 2024. Receipt and charges difference. Seems like there's many dishonesty in this app
Developer_Reply: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at http://m.me/Grab so that we can follow up.

Name: Kaith Ember-Young
Comments: Please update your maps, almost everytime I ordered food delivery the maps did not give the correct direction to rider which end up with scolding and everthing it's not a pleasant experience. Name: AMIR NAZIM

In the end I couldn't submit the form.

Name: Jia An Lam
Comments: Used to order from this store for supper. Delivery ~$2.80. I paid subscription so that if >$15 delivery minus $3. Now I check, delivery is $6.10. stupid to pay subscription for a year. Won't be renewing or using grabfood anymore. Moving to other apps

Name: Yash Wagle
Comments: This app is amazing. I had a trip to Vietnam and it was only source of transportation for most of my trip. It's English interface made it extremely easy to understand with the localites. Must recommend!

Name: helmy zakaria
Comments: I was using grab food like everyday, and now, somehow the menu is changed, the suggestion food or restaurant isnt clear at all, its better to move to other app *Edit in 2025 You cant cancel your order, cant talk with restaurat except if they are the one initiate the chat, and you know what the impact? Most of the restaurant doesnt read my notes, and theres once when my order that only 700 m from my place was need 1 hour to deliver, and you now what? I can cancel, what a joke*

Name: Thanh Pham
Comments: No longer has human support. Service price keeps going up, support keeps getting worse. It's so frustrating to wait 30 mins after placing an order, not getting a driver, restaurant haven't received the order, yet NOT ALLOWED TO CANCEL it. I cant wait for 90 minutes to get lunch, not knowing if it will ever go through. Not to mention drivers always take 2 order at the same time, slowing down shipping time even if the highest price was chosen

Name: MR
Comments: Generally good app. My biggest issue, however, is that it generates too many useless notifications. So for exsmple, if an order is going to take one hour to arrive, I really have to put up the annoying notifications all the entire time, effectively preventing me from doing anything else other than looking the app. Please find a solution for this!

Name: Jocelyne Lee
Comments: Use this with 0 expectations. It's always a 50/50 experience. Sometimes its wonderful, sometimes you get disappointed and the support centre is just as useful as chocolate teapot. App has been failing quite frequently in recent months. So, it might be useful sometimes, sometimes, be prepared to be disappointed.

Name: Bam bii
Comments: Its a good app. It helps me save time when I dont have time to cook. But the delivery drivers are too impatient sometimes especially here in cebu. It has happend to many times but they always ask for me to wait outside even though they are still far away its understandable that some customers take too long but is it not the point of this app is for it to be convinient? Correct me if im wrong. Thanks

Name: Charmaine Budino
Comments: It was great at first. Been using it since pandemic. However, lately its service became disappointing at times. Like what is the point of a food delivery if it can't deliver? And it's not like it's from a far distance or so. It was way better back then.

Name: Shailesh B
Comments: Grab car Hemat is the new waste of time introduced by Grab. It takes around 8-10 mins for car search. Then even if luckily car is found it's mostly 10-12 mins far. So in total of you want to book Car Hemat then book atleast 25-30 mins before leaving. Extremely frustrated with grab introducing unnecessary stuff.

Name: Florencio Jr. Tutor
Comments: Please do better. I'm so frustrated with the experience I have with grab from the delivery, fee, customer service and waiting time. I may switch to food panda starting tomorrow. They never cancelled my order and no delay. I'm just trying grab but I don't see any improvement from my last order.I have been using grab multiple times and having the same issue I've used the cheaper one and now the 50 pesos but the arrival time was too long.

Name: Hien Do Thi Thu

Developer_Reply: We're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to http://m.me/Grab üíöKat

Name: Neph
Comments: I have been in üáπüá≠ and üáªüá≥ for the past few months and have been using exclusively Grab. Once you get the hang of it, it become a lifeline for someone who is on foot. You can get everything! I've had a few orders canceled by the shops, but that's not Grabs fault. It's only happened when really busy or on a holiday. Every delivery person or driver has been great! One even helped me sort things out when an ATM ate my card, and I got my card back. I seriously love this app!

Name: patricia pasay
Comments: 1. Some grab drivers watching videos, doing unnecessary tasks on their fone while driving; 2. The location booked by passengers (us) appeared differently on the driver's; 3. Some grab drivers do not want to be corrected for more convenient route; 4. Overcharging fare (due to cancellation?-even if the driver is the one who canceled the ride); 5. Is your gps, location markings (for booking) for pick-up & drop off updated? Its difficult to pinpoint from the option choices
Developer_Reply: So sorry for this experience üòû Please reach out to us via the Help Centre or through our social media platforms so that we can further assist you with this concern. Thank you üôèÔ∏è

Name: J G
Comments: My order from grab food has been cancelled. They even charge me with 150 delivery fee for a 5 kilometer range. I even waited and when i checked the app my order was cancelled. Thank you grabfood for giving us memorable experience from 7pm to 10pm dinner. I have cancelled the stupid and useless membership. Lesson learned and app uninstalled.

Name: YusRizal 911
Comments: I like to give a 0 star if i could. Support team very slow to address missing item from food delivery order and giving lot of excuse & demand to avoid refund. In the end no compensation and user have to accept the blame and lame excuse from support team. Others food delivery app much better and faster to address the issues. Very disappointed and i just cancel my subscription plan with grab after 5 years of usage.

Name: Stephen Angeles (Tipi)
Comments: The holding time for payment is ABSURD. It gives you multiple methods for payment, and yet the reversal time differs per payment method???? And why does it take so long for cancelled orders?? Orders I myself didn't cancel but grab did because it can't find a driver for some damn reason? I can't rebook immediately because of this, some people take their money seriously, what the heck is this about? EDIT: STILL HAPPENING

Name: Vish Dev
Comments: Very bad customer services. I was charged for food delivery via my credit card... only to be told later by the rider that the restaurant is closed and won't be able to deliver the food. I had completed my complaint and they have responded that it's resolved. As they removed the transaction from the app, but there's no refund. So, how was it resolved? Where did my money go? And now when I was trying to get back to the customer service, there's no way of getting in touch. It's been a month now.

Name: Neil Patrick
Comments: Bring back the option to cancel GrabFood orders atleast a 10-second leeway/chance to change the address/items. I sometimes accidentally click the order button before adding/changing items or address, which results in placing multiple orders from the same store.
Developer_Reply: So sorry for this experience üòû Once your order is confirmed, the merchant will immediately start preparing it. As such, we won't be able to cancel the order to avoid food wastage. Please always double-check your order before confirming it to ensure you've included everything you want. Happy ordering!

Name: Agatha Chelsea
Comments: When i choose the route for the cheaper car option there is an error. It keeps going back to the recommended route. It's only happens to the app on my phone, i tried on the other phones it just works fine... I tried restarting the app also the phone nothing fixed the bug

Name: Jefil Christian Luna
Comments: As a user who mainly uses Grab as a rider app, the nature of its reliability and experience depends on the availability of riders and the distance towards your location. 15km and above, you might struggle to find riders, but 7km-8km and you find riders available most of the time. It's a convenient form of transportation for those who want to cover distances safely, and with the comfort of being inside a vehicle.
Developer_Reply: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you sharing this with us! Rest assured, we are continuously working to improve our services for everyone on the platform. Make sure to look out for updates to utilize our app's features! üíö

Name: Ben Tahan
Comments: Food delivery - No way to "cancel" even if the driver is not allocated and the restaurant did not receive the order. +No support!!! Multiple time waited more then one hour (on the status of "we have got your order") Some cases received the food hours later when it is no longer needed. And some it was auto cancelled.

Name: Rebecca Waldron
Comments: lovely drivers so far. But when you type in an address, it doesn't take you to the same place as google maps so sometimes you end up at the wrong place. It's better to pick your destination on the map so you are sure of where you are going

Name: NY Y
Comments: I can't view my profile almost every time I click on the account button. The page view keeps changing every time I enter Grab App. And also the VIP progress, I can't see my VIP progress if I enter the app from my list of apps. Quite weird, as the Grab app works better if I enter Grab app from Play Store.

Name: Lakshimi Mohan
Comments: Super disappointed and annoyed with Price Hikes & No Loyalty Benefits Grab's prices keep rising with no perks for long-time users. As a frequent rider, I expected better rewards, but instead, it‚Äôs getting less affordable. Hope Grab improves its loyalty benefits soon! Or else need to use other apps.

Name: Anthony Delmo
Comments: Gives you php50 discount, then when you order the app will say there's not enough driver in your area, but just outside McDonald's, that's where all the riders are standing by. Then it offers cash as a payment method, but the app will tell you then to go cashless and won't get you any rider to deliver your food. Then after 1.5hrs waiting, it canceled my order. Damn, this was good app before. Not anymore.
Developer_Reply: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations üòû Please reach out to us via Help Centre or through our Social Media platforms, so that we can review your concern further and take action. Thank you üôèÔ∏è

Name: Mohan Roy Gargie
Comments: Food delivery needs improvement when delivery is handled by merchant directly. Grab charges a fee to connect to merchant but does not own any responsibility to customer after that. Support with AI sucks and cannot get through to proper support. Have to repeat your issue a dozen times before getting to a support person. Grab has just made it very difficult to get support.
Developer_Reply: We're sorry to hear about the difficulties you've experienced with our food delivery service, especially when delivery is managed directly by the merchant. Name: Deszantara Z. Waly Laydie
Comments: Grab Car Plus & Grab Unlimited loyal user here. Partnership with Bluebird is actually a good idea; but it comes with some drawbacks too. 1. When the driver is not moving and does not come to pick you up, you decided to cancel and look for other drivers; but WHY THE HELL we have to pay 3k for the cancellation fees caused by the driver himself?!?!?!?!

Name: Yuyun Fatiha
Comments: This app make is frustrating. I buy a foods, then one of it is not available after i order, then my order become pricy as the voucher is removed from the order as my order not exceed RM25 (voucher RM7 off). It is not my wrong, but i have to pay the origin price even tho there is one more voucher that can be used (RM3 off for other RM15). The worst part of it, i couldn't cancel it after i know about it. I try to seek help, but the chat is being reply by AI only.

Name: Aoi
Comments: GrabFood filter option no longer has 'Halal' category, only Non-Halal category. If I'm searching for a specific menu, it'll show non-halal restaurants too & the list is exhausting to browse. 8 hours report policy after making an order also seems ridiculous. Should at least be 24 or 12 hours as not everyone always have time to immediately report once they finished eating. If you bought food at night n went to sleep n got diarrhea only the next day. How?? GrabCar OVERPRICING during 'peak hour'.
Developer_Reply: We're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to http://m.me/Grab.

Name: Azeem Rauf
Comments: Generally a great all-in-one app but they need to control their surge pricing - it can get absolutely outrageous sometimes. But for most things, it's an essential app to have. Edit, Feb 2025: everytime I get screwed over by Grab's surge pricing, I'm going to drop a star.

Name: Jason Paul Monlinong
Comments: Tonight I was really angry (normally I'm just annoyed) but I was really mad with anger and hunger since Grab Food Locker wouldn't open (my order used two and only one opened). I tried scanning the second time around for the second locker but I can't find the scanner already. What really made me angry though is the useless contact grab button and the useless chat bot. I asked for an agent but the chat bot and I were just running in circles. Please don't over rely on AI. Use efficient human CSR.

Name: Annaliese Guillebeaux
Comments: I totally love the app. Anywhere where there's restaurants and drivers partnered with Grab is very convenient to use. I think the only thing that I notice is when I ordered food and a driver took it. There's still a possibility of them backing out making the waiting time longer. I just found it curious, because one time the discount I have on an order got cancelled and reported it but I got no feedback on it.

Name: John Crandall
Comments: Grab food menu no longer translates to English. Has worked great for 2 yrs, now all the sudden, nothing. I've stopped ordering food as often. I guess that's a good thing, so there's a silver lining.

Name: Muhammad Syazani Satri
Comments: A lot of drivers don't want to pickup but they don't want to cancel. So they don't move and just let the customer wait so they eventually cancel. Grab should have a way to rate drivers like this and punish them. If you don't want to pickup just cancel the customer. What a selfish behavior and time wasting.

Name: Juan Wei
Comments: Application UI on end user is not friendly to user who don't like light mode and I just found out that the app have Dark mode for the grab driver partner but not the consumer.. That's really weird, hopefully they decide to put dark mode to consumer side.. Before that happen I'll give thjs all 1 start because I hate being flashbanged everytime I open the app and I even have my phone brightness on 20% It's crazy how bright this app is compared to other app..

Name: Ho Wee Jin
Comments: I actually install this app to book a taxi/cab but I found another app that book taxi/cab way lot cheaper. Another thing, grab should wave off the waiting fee for peak hour because we are paying so much more than regular hour. for now i only use this app for food is way cheaper than foodpanda

Name: Darius Ardales
Comments: I topped up ‚Ç±500 on the GrabPay wallet, but the transaction was declared unsuccessful, and the money was never returned. I strongly advise against using their GrabPay wallet‚Äîit‚Äôs unreliable and a potential risk for your hard-earned money. For a platform that claims to prioritize customer experience, this is a huge letdown. Think twice before trusting their payment system. Bad app.

Name: Jenny Redfern
Comments: The app suppose to have a call centre link to call but it doesn't exist in the Thai app. So frustrating that my food shopping is somewhere that I can't retrieve Editing as now another problem. Tried to purchase a food shop, redeemed a reward using collected points, app crashes and fails. Food shop gets cancelled but reward points not returned. Messaged help centre about it, long story short, app can't return points even if apps fault. Kind of annoying to lose 2000+ points.

Name: Joanna Shanti
Comments: NY order has been cancelled and we've waited for more the an hour just for the food to arrive turns up the food order cancelled. I'm texting on behalf of my mother and she is under medication and she needs to eat in time and last minute the merchant or the driver decided to cancel my order. You've wasted not only my time but also not keep up to your standards. Moreover you people don't even have a hotline to call when needed. Don't use grab!

Name: Alvin Alvario

We've been tolerating your fare premiums and surcharges in exchange for convenience, but at this point you're no different from what we hate about the local taxi system.

Name: Queenci Noelle Flores
Comments: Drivers are very friendly and nice and l really love their services but the problem is they sometimes take a very long time to accept and sometimes cancels which is very annoying and l understand some of them because they are very far away sometimes but some of them cancel even tho they are close to the area
Developer_Reply: So sorry for this booking experience üòîÔ∏è Hindi namin tino-tolerate ang aming mga driver na mag-cancel ng booking without any valid reasons. Rest assured that we have policies in place to ensure that corrective actions are fairly implemented üôèÔ∏è

Name: Use „Äã CashPirate App to Earn
Comments: Ok!!ATTENTION! My credit card info got stolen while using the grab app for transport. Just after using the app and paying by credit card, the exact same amount and then more is charged to my credit card for different types of transactions with a clear trend. The only answer is they dont share info with other parties, and they will inform me about the investigation. I didn't hear back after a couple of day

Name: Breadguy Alter
Comments: Pay attention to your recipt after a ride especially when you link a PIN-free payment method to a third party platform. I got an addtional charge from the driver after a ride in Bangkok via Grab without my consent and any negotiation. Been asked if an issue happened within 3 days, but I received no response after 3 more days even the report was done right after that ride. I heard that the drivers on Grab were well trained but don't know if this is trained or not.

Name: V
Comments: ordered car. grab then shows a full screen commercial. it takes me 2 minutes to figure out how to get to out of the commercial screen and see if a driver has been assigned. driver far away. hit cancel - tells me they're charging me 30 baht for not canceling within 1 minute of order!! How do you cancel within 1 minute of order when they don't show order?? Fix your app

Name: Rory Condon
Comments: Mostly ok app but for some reason the quoted price doesn't include toll fees in Thailand, and doesn't even tell you that the route will include them or how much they will be. Confusing when the driver asks for extra money and you have no idea if it's a scam. Should all be included in the price up front with no surprises later.

Name: Yap Nicky
Comments: The apps is getting worsen in 2024 for the location. Drivers always confuse where to pick up, very frequent to experience those drivers don'tknow where to go. 1 GPS not accurately show those pickup point , my location, driver l location 2 Pickup point description is ambiguous 3 call function very bad, cannot see the answering button many time when driver called me. After many times attempts only the answer button appears
Developer_Reply: Our apologies but that‚Äôs not the experience we want you to have. Are we able to have you reinstall the app, and if the issue persist, do drop us a note on Facebook via m.me/Grab in order for us to assist you further. üôèÔ∏è

Name: Kemy ‚ÄúShuli‚Äù SP
Comments: Not so convenient anymore.. they cancel on you if the destination is far. Sometimes they don't cancel on you, they just don't do anything until you cancel the ride. Never using this app anymore. Foods are overpriced versus when ordering in person or in a different app. If I could give it no stars, I would. Intro app bhie.

Name: Ge
Comments: Very poor customer service wherein there is almost no way you can reach them. No contact number, no live agent to assist you (if there is one you need to try all the possible combination in their bot). They try to automate everyting usoing their chatbot but it is really not effective to help you with your specific query. Even if you reach out via email their will just reply a templated response and it takes weeks or months for them to reply. Furthermore they will close the case without action!!!

Name: Ernest Gerrand
Comments: This app has always worked excellently. But here's a story and a word of caution. I only use the app for transport. Drivers pay a significant percentage to Grab. It provides a service that offers them increased customers. Some drivers attempt to forgo the company and offer rides directly to people on the street. This just happened to me in Hanoi. I thought that the price was high but not being well versed in the currency, I offered 2/3 of what he asked. He asked 6.5x the app rate I paid 4x !

Name: Muhammad Yazid
Comments: Used to have affordable and great service, but now it's just bots in help centers and grab unlimited means nothing! Even if you used the 3 dollar off delivery, usually the food comes 60 min to 90 min or even longer to the point , you got no choice but to cancel And the help service you don't even talk to actual people so if you got problem the bot can't help ,must send email but the email requires pictures to show proof however they have a image size limit! One jpeg can't even send so stupid.
Developer_Reply: Hi there, we are sorry for your frustrating experiences with our service. We're working on improving delivery times and customer support. Your feedback on image size limits and help center challenges is valuable and will be considered, thank you.

Name: Stephanie
Comments: I wonder why each time right after I book a drive, there's always annoying sound that kept playing, even after I hop on the ride. I've disabled notifications and disabled the ads, video ads on Grab setting, but still, the sound kept on and on. The sound just stops only when I force the app to close.

Name: OI Rain
Comments: This trash app doesnt allow cancel Order and continuously pester you to give it money before hand. Even if it CAN NOT find a driver. Absolute scam. This piece of c.. software ask for identity clarification. No service is worth my privacy. The app refuse to cancel the order and pay back the money even though it can not fullfill the order.

Name: Paul Fitzgerald Villarino
Comments: Last 5:14 PM I booked with Grab. However in the middle of it the app automatically logged me out, and no matter how many times I tried to log in, It's always in error, The Help Centre is also pretty useless. So I decided to use a different transportation, and then little did I know that my booking went through because the drive suddenly called however, I was no longer at the pick up point and not able to cancel the booking as I was logged out of the app. So why was I charged with No show fee?
Developer_Reply: So sorry for this experience üòû Please reach out to us via the Help Centre or through our social media platforms so that we can further assist you with this concern. Thank you üôèÔ∏è

Name: Florian R√ºcker
Comments: Can't cancel food orders anymore!! I was forced to wait 50 minutes with no drivers found AND then they cancelled the booking without asking me. I think they really hate their customers AND it's clear the product managers and managers don't use the app themselves. Added 4% fee for my payment option without notifying me. I overpaid for a long time, just found out now. Very disingenuous.

Name: Jeremy Perbet
Comments: It‚Äôs become impossible to get a taxi, and even when paying for priority, food delivery takes no less than 90 minutes! Keep going like this, and it‚Äôs no surprise everyone I know is switching to alternative apps. To the developer responsible for this app: stop automatically changing the delivery address to the one your app suggests! Does your logic even make sense? Sending my order to the random location you decide‚Äîwhat‚Äôs the point? Despite repeated complaints, nothing has been fixed. Every day,

Name: Joon Nie
Comments: Been using the app for sometime now, there is always missing item from the food order. Today I didn't receive 4 out of 6 items, that is more than half of my food order. I have reported the missing item, which total cost $20.40, but they only refund me $15. I will not change my review until I got my refund. I will have to place another order again, what a waste of time. Really disappointed.
Developer_Reply: We're sorry to hear about your experience. For immediate assistance, please use our Help Centre or reach out to us on our social media pages.

Name: Nadia Amalia
Comments: My food order was kept unpicked by supposed "grab express" until it became cold but the driver told me that they picked the food as soon as the order came. So i guess there was some error in the app, a time gap between merchant finished cooking the food and driver received the order. I spent a lot on this food and i couldnt cancel it. Please fix your problem!

Name: Daniel Borja
Comments: Annoying.. can't even cancel the order if you want to change the address or order. The address suddenly change from a different location and I'd like to not cause inconvenience to the delivery but I cannot make any changes nor cancel the order.

Name: J
Comments: Frustrating. I was able to transfer money into grab wallet, however i was not able to make any payment nor transfer the money back to my bank account. The support centre only replies once every 2 days. They have no intention to solve my issue. Stay away from Grab Wallet.
Developer_Reply: We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. If the payment was declined, please check here: https://help.grab.com/passenger/en-sg/900005145483. If the payment went through but the recipient never received it, please report it here: https://help.grab.com/passenger/en-sg/360034762932 .

Name: C
Comments: From initial launch till now, its slowly going backwards. You would be better off downloading the other smaller transport apps such as RYDE or TADA. Their rates and services are so much more affordable. An example: 18th January 2025. A ride from Tampines to Bukit Batok would cost me $68 via GRAB, $36.54 via RYDE. I was also able to get a ride much faster on RYDE vs GRAB. Sure there are pros and cons, but is it worth being a Plat member w/ subscription? Naur.
Developer_Reply: Sorry to hear that you are dissatisfied with our fares. All fares are subject to dynamic pricing based on the demand and supply in your area at the time of booking. During high-demand periods, you may consider booking GrabTaxi for metered fares.

Name: Sara Azrin
Comments: Grab suddenly logged out of my account for "re-registration" and then would NOT let me log back in via email nor mobile, constantly giving me error messages. Also either there is no way to contact support via the website or it is hidden, so I had no choice but to repeatedly try log in with my credentials until it went through.

Name: Jin Marcaida
Comments: Stores that are not available anymore are still on app. Then when the order is canceled, the refund would take 2-3 business days. Last time another store is already close but it is open says on the app. Is this for real? This is so inconvenient especially to people who are starving. Fix your app.
Developer_Reply: So sorry for this booking experience üòîÔ∏è Our merchant partner is in charge of this. We also asked them to keep their information updated at all times, from their menu to operating hours, so that both riders and consumers are informed. Thank you!

Name: Nithyasri Ganesan
Comments: The service is sucks. Driver will not reach your place, and after reporting, they will cancel the booking and just support specialist say sorry like nothing happened. After reporting the driver and I plan to do new booking, and another driver cancel it. Can you imagine how they delay everything. I plan to get a grab at 7am. And then they dragged it until 7.30am. Like all my plans are ruinedüò≠
Developer_Reply: We're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to http://m.me/Grab.

Name: Kate Alda
Comments: They are not transparent with booking fees. It doesnt show how much is the booking fee when booking a ride. You will only be surprised when you arrive your destination. I paid 75pesos booking fee plus meter for a 2.1 km ride. Discounts dont apply for grabtaxi. It took 42mins until someone accepted the booking and the driver arrived with different plate number and messaged this via app. Very unsafe. Not recommended. Lets use Maxim app instead, atleast they are transparent with 55 booking fee

Name: Tjomme Henny
Comments: Booking a taxi in less touristic places like Cha Am Thailand does not guarantee you a taxi We booked a taxi in advance to drive us to Bangkok, nobody shows up. Even though the app confirms the booking, it is still a gamble. Would they have told us about the possibility that nobody could show up, I would not be as negative as I am now. So the app works great, being dependent on the local population in less tourist environments is a risk.

Name: Loretta Lyn Soliven
Comments: I've been a long-time user of this app. Only this time have I experienced so many significant delays. I've ordered multiple times and consecutively, It's taking more than 2 hours for my order to be accepted then I had to wait 1 hour more to be delivered to me when usually, orders are delivered immediately They kept on delaying it without knowing the exact reason. One order was even cancelled after waiting 3 hours to be accepted.

Name: Shermay Boo
Comments: First time rating an app because this seems my last resort. Used grab to get a ride overseas and was charged 4 times! Raised an issue with support on 22 Nov 2024, submitted all necessary info required and then followed up multiple times via email but didn't receive any updates on the resolution. I don't know how difficult it is to see whats the issue, esp. when one single ride was charged 4 times.
Developer_Reply: We're really sorry to hear about your experience. Being charged multiple times for a single ride is definitely not acceptable. Please reach out to our support team via Facebook at http://m.me/Grab so we can urgently look into this and resolve it for you.

Name: Lugnam S.
Comments: Most of the time when the driver call me, there are no answer button and the app would freeze that I can't tap anything on my screen. Have to wait for awhile until the driver hangup. Please fix it.

Name: Ain Z
Comments: No live agent. Suck customer service. Grab driver can cancel your booking depends on their mood even though you've waited for so long for them to arrive. Ridiculous fare charge. Automatically put you on higher toll route even though with no toll you can arrive the same time. Waited for food for more than 1 hour but cannot cancel because again, no live agent to attend you, just useless chatbot. Even when you complain through email, they're super not helpful. No action taken at all.

Name: Yurii
Comments: Grab car and motorbike 1. There's no easy way to report incidents. The interface offered now is obscurity, not usability. 2. Rebook automatically if driver canceled. Mart and Food 3. If I order food from home, I expect delivery address by default being home, not some previous addresses in the neighborhood. 4. Search in Mart basically does not exist. It picks only exact match of typed request, and there's absolutely no way to find a store with combination of goods.

Name: Milan Sillik
Comments: Can you finally fix it??? It's a terrible habit to keep people waiting for 60+ minutes only to cancel the order with excuse "we could not find any driver". Proper solution would be to cancel order within 5-10 minutes, if you can't find drivers, not for almost an hour...Keeps happening frequently.

Name: dani ducayag (Dane)
Comments: Sometimes it's just so difficult to get a driver. Also, I wonder why they removed Tuding, Itogon from their routes when it is nearer and more accessible than other areas of Baguio. In the past, I used to get grab especially when raining to tuding. the past few years they removed it from their list. so frustrating and disappointing. that's the reason for my rating despite the fact that many grab drivers render great service.

Name: Paul Natividad
Comments: Help Centre is not helpful at all. Chatbot does not function properly. It's been years but my account is still in pending verification status. I am unable to place any food orders. Name: Denise Gail Valera
Comments: You can barely get drivers in this app anymore plus you have to wait for quite some time before they cancel your order. I used to love this app now it is just a major hassle. It has so far been useless. Foodpanda doing a way better job now than them.

Name: Aly
Comments: The subscription is quite disappointing. There's not much difference when using Grab as is. I don't get much percent off or voucher when using subsription and when it's rush hour it's more expensive. Sad, I tried for a year subscription too (Seems to be my last). Grab Food is much worse. There are indeed, riders that cancels your order while in the middle of waiting (and refunds takes too long). I wish Grab let's their users block these riders so they won't get assigned to us ever again.

Name: Matt Rainforth
Comments: Rubbish app that can't keep previous payment methods linked to the account when you format the phone and reinstall grab again. The account remains but none of the old payment methods are there, making it impossible to unlink until you reach out to the even useless chatbot that does nothing to help with the issue and simply redirects you from one useless article to another, instead of putting you in touch with an actual live agent.

Name: Eunice Salvador
Comments: I am extremely disappointed with the service, particularly during the midnight-to-dawn hours. The waiting times are outrageously long‚Äîsometimes over two hours for an order! It is incredibly frustrating, especially when there‚Äôs no transparency about the delay or updates on the order status. The push for cashless transactions is another issue. While it‚Äôs marketed as a faster option, it‚Äôs not feasible for everyone. Not all customers have access to cashless payments...

Name: Vaibhav Pindikura
Comments: Oftentimes, drivers take too long to accept a booking and arrive for pick-up. I often wait for long periods and arrive late to my destination. Update 1: Apparently, peak hours occur frequently during the day, so Grab fares can become ridiculously expensive at any second. Update 2: I am on a 2-month free trial for GrabUnlimited which is supposed to expire at the end of next month. Now, mid-subscription, I lost the 35% off GrabFood voucher since the subscription supposedly already expired. ETA bad

Name: Jonah Gabriel

I'm not booking 30 minutes earlier just to be sure because there's no way to know if the riders have an existing booking, otherwise I would have booked prematurely. Get it out of your app. Nobody likes it.

Name: charlene chia
Comments: Grabshare's waiting time was 22mins, drive time was 45 mins. I would have reached my destination by public transport in that time with time to spare. What's the point of taking a cab and paying so much when I spend just as much time getting there for a fraction of the price with public transport. Never using grabshare ever again.
Developer_Reply: We are sorry for any inconvenience caused. For quick assistance, please use our Help Centre or message us on social media.

Name: Muhammad Farhan Ansory

Restaurants are increasing their price because of the daily voucher promo, they knew the they had it, so they mark up their prices even more now, even with the promo we're actually paying the same price if we dine in or even more because we still had to pay for the driver fares, this is madness!

Name: Pavithran Anbukarassan
Comments: The app performs well, and the promos and discounts are all extremely useful. I'm dissatisfied with the food cancelling process. For example, that day, I ordered rice and chicken. Name: Neshap OneSixty
Comments: Driver did not honor the quoted price. He wanted nearly double and would not cancel the ride for me to get a other driver. I reported to Grab but they did nothing. Cancellation by the user is subject to cancellation charges to be collected on the next trip if you pay cash. Uninstalled.

Name: Reduwan Chik
Comments: Don't waste your time downloading this app. There are plenty of other platforms such as gojek etc. stupid automated "customer service" that can't even solve your problems, Problematic drivers, sub par to say the least. Name: Lynda Tan
Comments: "Update your Grab to 5.343 to get rid of bugs from your everyday app experience" is quite the irony. Name: Calnus
Comments: UI layout is different on different device making it a hassle to use when changing device Edit: annoy me with location enable but still failed to properly detect my location despite working fine in the past. Just order a sushi king just to send it to the same sushi king and i can't even cancel the order

Name: Lucio
Comments: Good, but expected arrival time is usually wrong, and many times you get cancelled and waste a lot of time Also, sometimes gps takes bad position and you cannot change, cancel or contact the driver right away, even if it's delivery and you just placed the order which is frustrating )even if it's user mistake The app works generally fine Rates change depending on the peak hour (cam vary 2-3x regular price)

Name: Renevir Panizales (Tuts)
Comments: At first it was Ok. But then recently ordering food is a total waste of time!!! Your order get queued for no apparent reason even it's not at peak hours! No option to cancel after minutes of waiting so I could order something where I don't have to use this stupidass app!?!!?

Name: unlucky911
Comments: This app got upgraded, but they don't take note of payments. They're still charging me for a ride or an order that I paid for in 2021, and we all know that you can neither leave the vehicle nor receive an order without settling the payment first. The best way to fix problems with Grab is uninstalling it and switching to better service providers.

Name: Daniel Carrick

I would recommend another supplier instead of grab.

Name: pauline catayong
Comments: Searching for drivers for a food delivery takes an hour or more. And it always ends up being cancelled. Payment reversal takes time. It's just ridiculous. Name: rehanna mae sta ana

So, I always pay extra instead of the original price I need to pay for the delivery. I tried to contact them but didn't reach them. This happened to me twice.

Name: Joshua Bayron
Comments: The pin location currently has bugs. The locations I‚Äôve pinned are exactly in the right place, but when the driver arrives, they say the pin is in a different location.

Name: MeifwaRap

This happened to me not once not twice but 3 times in total.
Developer_Reply: We‚Äôre sorry about the delays you‚Äôve experienced. Sometimes high order volumes, peak-hour demand, or traffic can cause deliveries to run late, even if the food is prepared. We know this is frustrating, and we appreciate your patience. For immediate help, please contact us through the in-app Help Centre or on our social media pages.

Name: Robz DGreat
Comments: I had a recent experience with Grab booth at NAIA Terminal 1, they will ask for the drop off address and will tell you the price which is much higher than the recommended fare by app. Their price is 490 and when I checked the app it is only 340. And they are not using the app to book passengers, so it is now like any other transport service in NAIA. They also have a scheme of adding more to the fare saying to the passenger if you want to ride right away the price is 900. So use your app to book.
Developer_Reply: Overcharging passengers is a serious violation and we take these kinds of reports seriously, Robz. If you have more information regarding this matter, please reach us through our social media channels so we can take appropriate actions üôèÔ∏è

Name: Jen Sioson
Comments: Now they put me on time out because I have cancelled too many times! How can I not cancel? When I book at 1am and its 15 mins wait?! And I work at 1:30am that will make me late! So of course I have to cancel and get someone nearer! No action on the complaint I raised regarding a driver charging me toll fee when there's no toll fee and it is exactly the same route I take every night. A-75459GNGWG5W

Name: Weng Hong Low
Comments: I was wrongfully charged a cancellation fee when the driver cancelled on me. The app did not notify me of this fee until the next time I needed to book an urgent ride, only to be told that I cannot book any rides until I paid the fee. Please do not use Grab if you want to avoid predatory, extortionate practices like this.

Name: Onno Schouten
Comments: My review used to be 2 stars. Now its 1 star. First, the food ordering is a complete scam with tons of hidden fees that will make your order at least 2 times as expensive. Secondly the taxi service works good in singapore, kuala lumpur and bali, but it is terrible in phuket. Drivers keep asking to cancel or they dont move at all for 20 minutes till i cancel and then grab threatens me with cancelation fees!
Developer_Reply: Hi there, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced. This is not the service we aim to provide. Rest assured that we are reviewing further for improvement. Thank you for highlighting this to us and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.

Name: Justin Nguyen
Comments: I'm currently in the middle of my trip to Vietnam and the app, all of sudden on a Sunday, popped up a msg stating that if I'm using a foreign issued credit card, I would need to contact customer support. This is after 3 days of using the app for rides in Vietnam. Apparently the issue has been referred to another department for review which will take 2-3 business days. I fly out of Vietnam in 2 days. This is absolutely sudden and extremely inconvenient. Will likely be the last time I use this app

Name: Vee Halen
Comments: This app should allow cancellation BEFORE drivers are assigned. There are times when other options came up, but I can't stop the search; drivers are still assigned and I end up having to cancel AFTER being assigned the ride. Could do better with this improvement.
Developer_Reply: Thank you for sharing your thoughts. You can currently cancel within 3 minutes after a driver is assigned without any fee. We appreciate your suggestion to allow cancellation before a driver is assigned, and we‚Äôll consider it for future improvements.

Name: John
Comments: Star rating is unresponsive. Every single time I tap away to give the driver 5 stars, and it does NOTHING! Eventually after many tries it works, and until it does, you can't pay for the fare. Unnecessarily frustrating!

Name: A Sandwich
Comments: The so called "Help Center" is just a dumb bot that can't actually help you, it's there so they can avoid helping you I've been trying to get some help regarding my issue with the address system because the dumb app prioritized its janky map system and gave my grabfood rider the wrong address, and instead of just giving me my food he just left with it without responding to me, just flat out ghosted me This app is extremely unreliable with its food service, don't bother with it, it's a scam

Name: Muhammad Ramdhani
Comments: Update: new problem, buggy app doesn't accept order anymore and said balance's not enough though it clearly is. Surprise surprise the restaurant did it again(twice in a row!!!)
Developer_Reply: Hi there! That is not the experience we want you to have. Please write to us via Facebook at m.me/Grab so that we can look into your feedback. Thank you.

Name: Paula Erispe

Name: Leena Uthayakumar

Any available help is literally no help!!!!

Developer_Reply: You might be automatically logged out if the app updates or your phone restarts. To prevent having to re-enter your card details each time, set up a GrabPIN in your settings. If you need further assistance, please reach out to us on our social media pages.

Name: ÏïºÎãàMerianne
