Name: Bien Malto
Comments: Ever since ilI downloaded this app, It crashes all the time and it has WAY TOO MANY ERRORS lol. Also i can't change my location and said connection error when clearly i have good wifi.

Name: Alia Damar
Comments: these ads are getting out of hands. I seriously don't care about those movie trailer, game, etc, and while I wait, I'd rather do something else instead of watching the video, duh. literally playing automatically, can't even be paused, and slowing down the app itself from running. that's too bad, and takes up too much internet data even for single usage.

Name: Hani Dew
Comments: The way they work is very good, fast, and easy. However, I often hear riders say that they have no money to return to the customer. At first, I thought they were really short of money, so I gave the money as a 'tip'. But after ordering regularly, I realized that almost all riders do the same thing. I believe that Grab should take the initiative to return the money accurately and not take advantage.

Name: Dai John
Comments: I tried to book for a taxi and grab cant find anything, then i cancelled. 15 mins later grab automatically re book my booking without my consent, and i had to cancel again with cancellation charge. This has happened twice recently. Grab if you do not maintain your app properly people will eventually uninstall your app
Developer_Reply: We have not had this issue reported to us before, and we'd certainly like to work this through for you. Could you share the details at http://m.me/Grab? And any relevant screen recording or screenshots would be immensely valuable. Thank you.

Name: Adam
Comments: Waited for around 15 mins for a driver to drop off previous passenger only to have my booking cancelled by the driver for whatever reason. This has happened many times. Reported this to the customer service and I got a response not in English even though I selected English in the Help Centre setting. Asked them to respond in English and they just close the case without further response. Why do I bother using this app?

Name: Justin Chantioco
Comments: The price threshold for cash is too low, plus canceling an order just because its payment method is cash and was made without prior notice? We waited for more than 2 hours just for our orders to get canceled. What a waste of time.
Developer_Reply: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations üòû Please reach out to us via Help Centre or through our Social Media platforms, so that we can review your concern further and take action. Thank you üôèÔ∏è

Name: Emz Martinez
Comments: I have been using Grab for several years and as a loyal customer, I have always relied on this app for convenience, but my experiences have left me increasingly disappointed. I'd like to highlight the following concerns: 1. Lack of Promos for Loyal Customers 2. Inconsistent Pricing and Unjustified Fare Increases-Grabcar taxi drivers charging more than what's on the app. I‚Äôve also observed that the fare continues to rise, even though the delay in service is when there's no driver in my area.

Name: atelim2001
Comments: Advanced booking for Grab Car is VERY UNRELIABLE!! A driver who accepted the trip half a day before the trip can cancel the trip 10 minutes before the appointed time. A 2nd driver was assigned by Grab. 2nd driver messaged me to ask me to cancel my booking. I told the 2nd driver I would not cancel on my end but asked her to cancel the trip herself as I did not want to be imposed a penalty. Then all of a sudden a message appeared on the App to ask me to rebook my trip. VERY UNRELIABLE!!

Name: Enowell Danieyl
Comments: Terrible, no way of contacting a live agent. When my brother lost his phone in the grab car we then tried contacting his phone to no use and now we tried contacting the help centre to find a way we could contact the driver but to no use. We tried for so long and it's so damn useless. Great app to drive but the worst customer service ever

Name: Fong Yin Kah
Comments: Never ever order food using grab app if you are hungry or in a rush. Although you're ordered earlier but the actual time arrived always later than estimated time. It took almost 2 hours for me to wait and at the end the ordered is cancelled. It just happened to me. I was thinking better not to order food using delivery services.

Name: Aisha goofygoober
Comments: Worst app ever. I've had many experience where the grab riders have gone missing with my food or they spill the drinks, smush the cakes etc, grab simply won't take responsibility over their careless riders, instead they'll push their customers to the restaurant. They don't even have a contact center to report these issues to. The "help center" in the app simply marks your case as resolved after pushing you unnecessarily to the restaurant. Their delivery fee and car fare are significantly higher.
Developer_Reply: We're sorry for any inconvenience. For fast help, visit our Help Centre or reach out to us on social media.

Name: Qian Ying Chang
Comments: This app always had a problem in that I'd already top-up the amount and the balance in my bank had been deducted but the Grabpay balance remained the same. I try to find the Help Centre but it always gives me the same answer which is not helpful and useful. I've faced this problem many times and it takes longer and longer to solve each time.

Name: mark christian osayda
Comments: same as the other review...only good at the begining...grab leads you to a longer and inconvenient route for both the driver and passenger...there is no option to use a different route...scams you to pay for a longer route when there is a better and no brainer route visible to the map!!! i have spent a lot in grab but it keeps getting worse...gudluck and goodbye...

Name: N GH
Comments: Rubbish app. Monopoly so zero incentive to improve. Virtually no customer service - bots leading you round in circles. Discredit to Singapore's ecommerce. How is it you pay extra for priority delivery, it gets unilaterally delayed by 30min and you can't cancel or call anyone I don't know. And bots leading you round in circles and asking you to fill up an e-form. Quick to take money; slow to help. Shameful.

Name: aibi 0608
Comments: The app has been wonky with orders lately, shortly I ordered food, it notified me of some problems and made me order another only to learn shortly that the previous order is ready. I have the vendor and driver(s) pleaded with me to cancel but the so called customer service doesn't allow it much less doesn't allow the vendor and driver to cancel which will affect their ratings and i feel terrible for them when they're just trying to make a living for us customers

Name: Awgko Syam
Comments: i have been using grab for a long time but i very disappointed with the survice, the price of the transportation get too high randomly even there is no traffic. I also have a different price from other user while we live in the same place and want to go to the same location.I have a grab unlimited and been using it for months. I have a lot of issues with my food like I can't cancel my food order and my food is missing and most of the time, there is no action have been taken. i feel robbed

Name: Liah M
Comments: DISPOSED OF MY UNDELIVERED ITEMS. Rider apparently can't find the correct location (note that the drop off has been my customer for 2 years already or more) was given clear instructions as to where the grab should hand the items. Driver completed the order. Got deducted from my Grab Pay. But item was undelivered. The response of the customer service via email was apologies & that they will reprimand the rider. So much BS - for a delivery platform, they don't care about my missing item.

Name: Lauri L√§hteinen
Comments: Restaurants that do not exist in the location given in the app. It's a disaster for pickup orders. They take your money in advance and you don't get your items and no way to contact anybody. The UI especially when ordering a ride is so bad. If I recall correctly, it was much better one year ago when I last used it.

Name: thomas moran
Comments: Terrible. Just a terrible terrible app, don't bother downloading it. Lists restaurants as open when they are closed. Then won't let you order from another restaurant "for you safety". B.S of the highest degree. The whole thing is just pointless.

Name: Joseph Romano
Comments: FOOD: Many choices will not tell you how big the pizza is, or how many pieces of chicken you are getting. Menu options often have NO description, sometimes no pictures. I can not get food delivery if it is raining, even HOURS after rain has stopped. CAR: Drivers will sometimes cancel your booking AFTER you wait 15 minutes for the driver to pick you up. The grab app tells you that you can just book another ride. Thanks for nothing.

Name: Stacey Heather
Comments: always delayed, especially the food delivery, i ordered just one food and it took them more than two hours to deliver. and that place is just 10-15 minutes away from me. very unsatisfactory and they charge way too much. i prefer the pink app. i wont recommend this to anyone.

Name: Matthew leong
Comments: Terrible food delivery experience. Ordered food and address shown was wrong so i thought i gave the wrong address. Delivery was marked as done so i thought nothing could be done and ordered again. 5 mins after second order the driver arrived with the food, tried to cancel second order but could not. Cancellation not allowed but food was obviously not in transit, as it took 1 hr 30 mins for it to arrive. No avenue for customer support.
Developer_Reply: We're really sorry to hear about your experience. Once an order is made, it cannot be canceled. Kindly double-check all details before confirming your order. For immediate assistance, please use our in-app help center or reach out to our social media pages.

Name: lain
Comments: Great app, so many features that are great. I love the implementation of being able to add stuff to your order from a nearby mart to your food order! The only issue is the grab car drivers that stood me up multiple times, but that's not Grab's fault. But I do hope they fix that though, maybe suspend those drivers for a few days.
Developer_Reply: We're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to http://m.me/Grab.

Name: Pickled Bullets
Comments: I forgot the old email i solely use for this app, and now when i got a new phone, everything, the sign in cache were wiped, i cant log in nor sign up with a new email address because this app is linked with the email that I FORGOT entirely, i cant remember the name nor the password for it. And it will NOT, WILL NOT let go of that linked email NO MATTER WHAT, i AM EFFECTIVELY LOCKED OUT of the app that Im trying to use to GET AROUND simply because it were designed to be as paranoid as possible.

Name: Wahyu Tri Sulistyo (Wahyu)
Comments: Very helpfull. But your app is bloatin my phone. I'm using grab only for transportation. Not food. So please consider differentiate the app into 2 or more version. Thank you. Rating down to 3 for now. About the grab service itself, lately very disappointing. The rate is very high. And most of the grab car now is not very comfy, like air conditioner not cool enough and interior feel dusty inside. Not a comfortable experience.

Name: Ben Mari Margelino
Comments: Worst appever.My money is still onhold aftsr I cancel my order.The live chat support is also a bot and is notgiving me an option to chat with an agent. Truly an inconvenient map ever. Name: Bernardo Besario
Comments: It's only good at the start but I really hate when you order groceries and the store just cancels the entire order if ONE item is missing even though I have 10 other items available. And grab's stupid authorization hold doesn't return my money until the next day when I really need it immediately. It would be fine if they allow COD for groceries over 1000 pesos but NO they don't. THIS APP IS NOT RELIABLE whether it's food delivery or transpo.

Name: Christave *_-
Comments: What happened to this app?? I always enjoy using this app, but recently, I always get the far driver even though there are drivers nearby me. The worst is that the driver is not ready, so I need to wait more until they finally get on the road. Will choose another option to get to work. I have always arrived late these days since then

Name: Gonzo
Comments: Absolutely zero customer service when it comes to ordering food or having a problem with an order -- which has happened to me multiple times. Everything is handled through some kind of chat bot with no way to reach a real human to help you when things aren't going the way they're supposed to.

Name: Constantine Low
Comments: Update: Grab has removed the GXS thing and showed the "wallet" instead. Still, it's unlike last time when we can straightaway see the wallet balance. Now when I travel on Grab car, the map keeps showing a tag on my destination on the map, says "Downtown Core - see Dine Out deals". The tag is blocking my view of the map and I do not know if it can be even disabled - cannot close it. Very user unfriendly.
Developer_Reply: We are sorry to hear about your experience. Please reach out to us via the Help Centre or our social media platforms so that we can take a closer look at this. Thank you.

Name: Bob Dawkins
Comments: Awful service!!! Tried all day to get a simple grab taxi from various locations over manila and not a single car answered to our searches at all. Need more drivers urgently. Or the app is not working as it should. Manil is the central city and busiest location so why the hell can't grab provide 1 single car.

Name: C P
Comments: First time installed app and cannot proceed after I entered my location (for grab food). Even when I turned on my location GPS the app won't detect/accept/find my current location, I already entered full address also can't proceed app. Uninstalled many times. Will try other apps (not sure how users install Grab successfully, not gonna waste my time and also seems expensive)

Name: Lloyd Burton
Comments: Grab is used a lot in Thailand so downloaded it while I was there. Overall it was useful at getting us a ride, but the route is takes drivers can be very unpredictable and inaccurate. The drivers always had to switch to Google Maps and ignore the route which Grab said to take.

Name: Lie Wei Cheah
Comments: Not user friendly. Navigating around the app is confusing. I am also unable to see past transaction history after not having use the app for about 2 months. A user friendly app would tell user where or how they can access their older activities or transaction record.

Name: Yamantaka
Comments: Doesn't work well, no customer service. The grab car always worked for me. The grabfood refused to work in Thailand, Malaysia, and Indonesia Contacted Grab customer service, they gave me an irrelevant recommendation, I told them that wouldn't work for me. They sent the same recommendation again. Useless! There is no explanations of their policies Uber > Grab

Name: L V
Comments: It has a very comfortable UI and easy to navigate. What I liked about the app is that you can stack the vouchers, so you can save a lot if you're doing big orders. At the moment, I only used the Food grab services, so I'm not sure about the others, but it is a very convenient app.

Name: Weng Kong Chong
Comments: - High ride fares - Drivers who accepted became idle, and what's worse, cancelled it after making us wait for a long time - Ride interface became even more cluttered and confusing: mini picture on top of pickup point, ad behind driver's car, zooming in map brings up the ride info, driver's car location being out of route

Name: Ernalin Rom
Comments: I understand it‚Äôs the holiday season and things can get busy, but waiting almst two hours for my order, with the delivery time constantly being adjusted, is ridiculous. It‚Äôs almost funny how it keeps claiming ‚Äúon-time delivery‚Äù while clearly being far from it. Why not simply cancel the order if it‚Äôs taking too long instead of dragging it out minute by minute? To make matters worse, there‚Äôs no quick option to cancel on my end, and the chatbot is completely unhelpful‚Äîterribly poor service overall.

Name: Dashiini
Comments: App sucks. No point in asking to choose a delivery time as drivers will only give us the food when they're available. Worst of all, your chatbot is only catered to help customer service rep, not the customers. It will never ever allow you chat with a live agent. It'll give you unnecessary options or end the chat. Same goes for refund. Will never allow you to get a refund. Actually, it's a good money-making technique by Grab. You have to pay more for them to give you messed-up customer service.
Developer_Reply: Apologies for the trouble. For rapid assistance, please use our Help Centre or reach out on social media.

Name: Kun Wang
Comments: It won't let me order if the food totals S$50 or more, saying that I need to contact help. Sure, except that help is stuffed by a bot which only provides scripted response and gives me the run-around. The saving grace seems to be that grab is not a monopoly yet. If it is, break it up!

Name: Pietro Miglierini
Comments: The app's UX is a nightmare. You get charged a cancellation fee even if the problem is not on your side. You get charged extra for tolls and "other" fees after the ride without prior notice. Just horrible. Monopoly excuses.

Name: Dave Lazarick
Comments: I've used grab twice now and I am very happy with the service. especially coming from the airport where I have heard two horror stories of people being ripped off with a supposed taxi company. including one that pretended to be a Grab driver. this one was told to me directly from the victim. if you are reading this, make sure you download the app and only order a driver from the app.

Name: Johnson Fisher
Comments: easy to use once you get it set up. it's got good technology for connecting with the driver for your specific location. for example, my old file has a wall attached and so it's got about five entrances. You can identify exactly which one and in the app.

Name: Ryandani Bendesa
Comments: I enjoy using grab, but this is just another level of trash. The driver is lazy to pick up order. choose the priority delivery for a reason, but not only once, it's been 6 times this is happen and i have enough. They keep making me waiting for more than 1 hour to get me nothing. I sitting here waiting more my food like an idiot. Meanwhile the driver is being lazy not picking up my food ( confirmed with the resto ) and the worst part about it is, i need to wait really long time to cancel this bs.

Name: larry poquiz
Comments: Hey Grabfood, you should ensure that there's a driver first before getting/debiting our money to lessen the hassle if our order gets cancelled because it takes so much time/days or worst is that you can't return the payment done when it's cancelled. It's like you are earning our money without us benefiting from your service. Thus, all we can get is frustration and hunger. Uninstalling. Switching to Foodpanda. Thank you for your service. Guess why the name of this app is "Grab"

Name: The Amsterdam guy 1
Comments: Terrible accuracy with grab taxi. Picked a spot on map and ended up being on the other side of a road. Hard to zoom in on the map, always cutting me to the "driver is still on the way" page. Great trouble for both the passenger and the driver.
Developer_Reply: Apologies for the inconvenience. For immediate assistance, please check our Help Centre or contact us via social media.

Name: Melissa Lam Lisa
Comments: Dear Grab, My name is Melissa, I recently downloaded back the app grab and when I log in and the app need the selfie recognition face when I try to do the selfie it always didn't work and got told to much lighting, position your head in the circle and put your phone further away. I already do what the app asked for the selfie many time and it got to the point I'm feeling frustrated. I delete the app and download the app back and the result always the same. Please fix this for urgent useüôè

Name: thomas santiago
Comments: 1. The notifications keep pop-up repeatedly even I already exit/force stop the app. 2. When the driver call me via the app, ring tone still ringing even I already accepted the call. Resulting I can't hear what the driver due to the ring tone is louder than the driver's voice.
Developer_Reply: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you sharing this with us! Rest assured, we are continuously working to improve our services for everyone on the platform. Make sure to look out for updates to utilize our app's features!

Name: Van Hudson Galvoso
Comments: Nothing special, just like any other delivery app, but it's frustrating that you can't cancel the order(grab food) when it takes too long because they can't find a rider. I'm never going to use grabfood again until they fix this.

Name: Carl Calzado
Comments: During my car rides, I love to listen to music using my earphones, then suddenly during one of my rides there's christmas music which I can't find how to turn off. Until thia gets resolved, I'm not putting away this 1-star, and I'll be using in-drive instead.

Name: reuel alburo
Comments: Worst app, refunds for debit and credit cards transactions will take 30 days??? They charged me the full amount of my grocery cart but the refund for the unavailable products will take 30 days? This is the worst app and delivery service. This is very unacceptable!

Name: Jaden
Comments: My grab car order are always canceled by the grab driver and nothing we can do as a customer even rating for the rudely driver. The moment I order the grab car, he accept my order and then he cancel it after I wait 10 minutes! Grab had lost my time frequently and I need to pay my time to re-order it. The moment I encountered these situations are early in the morning 6 a.m. and in the midnight 3 a.m. Regarding these situations, I as a customer even can't do anything! So I use other e-hailing app.

Name: Ae
Comments: It's ironic how the delivery fee is much more expensive compared to the standard df of other food delivery apps and has less delivery rider (which causes delays and high numbers of canceled orders). They do offer discounts and points, but it's also frustrating.

Name: Robyn Naymick
Comments: Our driver dropped us off 3 miles shy of destination because he was tired of traffic. Since we do not speak T hai, we could not argue. We were charged what he quoted us but he didn't complete the ride. Thank goodness for google maps. We are older people. What if we didn't have tech ability. Un-safe to have this driver continue.

Name: Joy DR
Comments: Grab PH customer service sucks. They can only be reached via email and they don't respond. Issue doesn't get fixed. When you run in to problems, you cannot trust that Grab will help. I was given a Grab voucher as a gift but there was bug in the system I cannot redeem it. I reached out for help but Grab would not respond even after multiple follow ups. Disappointing.

Name: raphael montes, jr.
Comments: The app keeps changing my food delivery pin to the pin from where I take my grab car rides. I will have no problem if the grab car picks me up at my door step. But i'm doing the grab drivers a favor by not forcing them to enter our narrow street. But the app keeps on changing my food delivery pin to the grabcar pin. I have to walk 300 meters everytime the pin gets changed üôÑ

Name: elicia
Comments: customer service getting worse over the years, unable to find any actual help on app or website. app allows u to report merchants but not riders/drivers, thats why the riders are getting arrogant and thought they can do what they wished. if nothing is going to be done or improved, its better to stop using it since the prices are not competitive anymore.
Developer_Reply: Sorry for the inconvenience. For immediate help, please check our Help Centre or connect with us on social media.

Name: Clea Sarin
Comments: Almost lost our order because grab call's feature didn't go through. It was almost 15 minutes up, driver called multiple times, not one call went through. He even chatted multiple times, but got no notifications about it. Fix your communication system with the drivers.

Name: Maria Cheyenne Sicsic
Comments: This is the second time I‚Äôve been overcharged using mastercard for GrabTaxi, and it‚Äôs frustrating. On Dec 13, 2024, I was charged ‚Ç±648 instead of ‚Ç±426, and on Jan 5, ‚Ç±432 instead of ‚Ç±352. While refunds are processed, it‚Äôs a tedious and time-consuming process. I‚Äôve also seen other reviews reporting similar cases that remain unresolved. It feels like Grab isn‚Äôt addressing this issue seriously, which could lead to loss of trust in your service. Please take action.

Name: John Jasson Alfiscar
Comments: This app can't receive the delivery phone call. I tried it many times and didn't really work. Edit: It has a very poor connection unlike when I play YouTube with data, it's very fast but when it comes to this app was the opposite of fast.

Name: Caoimhan dunne
Comments: Be aware in places app is used. Vietnam , Indonesia example Bali was the worst place. Be aware that when in a current location , there could be drivers using the grab app and will be watching you on your phone, they will be able to see from where you have booked the taxi from and then they will accept the request , then they will walk over to you and tell you that they cannot drive you due to local taxi cartel, then they will offer to a friend to drive you for 100k extra cash.

Name: Leigha Pi
Comments: I got a Grab Unlimited membership, hoping it would be cheaper for the food I ordered. When I compared my order with my daughter's Grab, I found that the subscription was a huge scam. My daughter, who did not avail herself of it, will pay less than I, who availed myself of the subscription. It's disappointing!

Name: Renville Francisco
Comments: I keep trying to place my order but the app just repeatedly says, "Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later," even though there is nothing wrong with the order. Your app and customer service sucks. I am cancelling my subscription.

Name: Christine Joy Pagupat
Comments: At was great at first but now it's worst. The services took so long! Sometimes it automatically cancels which is VERY inconvenient! The riders took so long to accept the orders and then whenever they cancel it takes forever to refund

Name: Darshini Kalaichelvam
Comments: Getting worse and worse. I cant even make purchases.Everytime there is an error asking me to contact Help center but it's not easy to contact them because the app doesn't allow us to contact them. If not for the grab transport I would definitely uninstall this app.

Name: Gustian Sadewa
Comments: Such a waste of my time. I'm ordering grab food with priority delivery, the driver somehow got a different road thats supposed to go to my home. Its like he delivering another order. After contacting the help center, yes turn out now the driver allowed to take other orders while delivering priority order, wow. Now Iam delayed by more than 30 minutes. I choose priority so that it can deliver directly without stop to my place, but now, turn out Grab's new policies said differently. Great!

Name: ohara fan
Comments: Useless app does not allow me to add my visa card as a payment method. My card is working fine for every service, including purchasing games from steam but this bs app. They want me to register for vietcombank smsbanking to use my card properly. Anyone who has functioning braincells would not register for that when the banking client app is good enough and can replace all digital wallets. I would only raise stars if my card can be added. I wont use other wallets as payment method.

Name: JunoLoo
Comments: I am extremely disappointed with Grab's unprofessional handling of my recent order. My order was neither delivered nor refunded, despite repeated attempts to reach customer support. This kind of service is unacceptable for a platform of this scale. I trusted Grab to deliver on its promises, but this experience has left me questioning the reliability of the service. I urge the company to improve its customer support and implement stricter measures to ensure timely refunds for failed deliveries.

Name: Peter Piper
Comments: Food items wont load... When i choose a restaurant, the menu of the resto won't load anymore. This happened after i updated the app to the latest version. I see all the restos but after choosing one, the menu won't load. I can't order food anymore.

Name: Me Matters
Comments: Almost like a scam. First, it does not list all the addresses. Second and worst, if you fail to verify the payment successfully, the price will go up each time you rebook. Higher third time....due to high demand. Funny

Name: Corona Black
Comments: I like the app as well it's reliable when I needed a tale out while I'm at work, but it would help if it can remove locations on where I am because some of the locations just pops out of its own than my actual location that I felt bad for the drivers to pin point where I am

Name: Izzan
Comments: Grab is a really scummy brand, lets food companies take advantage by charging more for the same food but when items are missing or wrong, you get a $3 voucher instead of any refund. Worst part is now there is no live service agent for support. You have to submit a form and they take their time to reply to you by email. They say they can take their time up to 12 hours, and they will undercompensate you to make you give up so that they profit off your missing/wrong items.
Developer_Reply: We're really sorry to hear about your experience. This isn't the service we aim to provide for our users. Please contact our support team via Facebook at http://m.me/Grab so we can help to resolve this for you.

Name: Hanzel Patricio
Comments: Told me i exceeded the 4person capacity even though I ride alone. Drivers always cancel and it takes too long to book. Edit: Grab replied to this feedback saying to reach out via email or socials which I already did btw before I gave feedback but alas! Still no reply just automated emails. Amazing üòÇ Raised another concern and chat agent just ended the convo ü§£. Lowering from 3 to 1.
Developer_Reply: Grab strongly advise drivers to follow and honor the bookings. Please reach out to us via Help Centre or through our Social Media platforms so we can further assist you with this. Thank you!

Name: Sonik Soundworks Mastering
Comments: Great when it works but has issues. I travel a lot and the consistent card failures due to security checks/verifications is really frustrating. Is it possible to limit the verifications to once every 3 weeks? Either that or build a travel notice into the app like banks do so we can use the service without interruption while traveling abroad. Adding Pay pal or Google pay is another option that would eliminate this issue.

Name: Farhan Macalawi
Comments: My order was automatically canceled due to lack of grabfood rider? Why the hell would they automatically cancel it instead of giving us another option. This app is not optimized to accomodate COD at all. This app just made me wait for more than 1 hour and just automatically cancelled it without any remorse at all. Wasted and ruined my day because of this stupid app and stupid system.

Name: a sad habs fan
Comments: Trash service. Drivers are always pulling scams like making you wait for almost an hour then not responding & cancelling while customer svc is not helpful at all every single time. I've had a couple refunds for cancelled orders & svcs not returned to my card/bank as well. This company is just taking our money and providing awful service ir no service at all, i wish we could get uber or lyft back here.
Developer_Reply: So sorry for this experience üòû Allow us to make it up to you. Please reach out to us through our social media channels so we can assist you and take appropriate actions üôèÔ∏è

Name: Harper Chen
Comments: The driver had an irresistible personality‚Äîhe was extremely cordial, friendly, and spectacular! I appreciate his outstanding hospitality. I even had the pleasure of listening to 'Love Story' by Taylor Swift, which was coincidentally played on the radio. Being a Swiftie, that was absolutely the best ride I've ever been on! We even had a long, heartfelt conversation with each other. Apart from that, the car was really clean and comfortable. All in all, he provided excellent service, and I rate the

Name: Riley Filteau
Comments: App works good, no complaints there. Complaints for the company operations - what is the use in having a book in advance feature if every time you use it the drivers are 15+ minutes late and you end having to cancel half as no show and then book on the spot anyways? Overall, can recommend Grab for immediate trip bookings.

Name: Sidi Rashid
Comments: Grace waiting period is too short. Sometimes driver haven't arrived or arrive at wrong place and click "arrived" and passengers get affected. Next, poor support and customer service system. No consequences for grab delivery drivers with no show, take your paid food and not deliver even though say arrived. I'm an avid user of Grab for nearly 10 years, and I just see this app getting worse and worse. Please remember we are the consumers.
Developer_Reply: Our apologies but that‚Äôs not the experience we want you to have. Are we able to have you drop us a note on Facebook via m.me/Grab in order for us to assist you further. üôèÔ∏è

Name: Hubert Fernandez
Comments: never lets me order food with credit card everytime I try, I can only process via cash. then it takes 20+ mins to find a driver, while it keeps prompting me to use my card and keeps failing. then my account gets flagged for security reasons, whilst the entire time im trying to pay via grab's preferred method. idiotic.

Name: Arvi
Comments: The grabplus now includes bluebird taxi. Though it is faster to get one ride, the quality of the blue bird taxi is a downgrade on what is expected on a grabplus type of car. This is a disappointment since grabplus is more pricey and yet we get an ordinary taxi. üòì It is cheaper if we just have goblue taxi from gojek.

Name: K T
Comments: Your drivers are ignoring booking requests for under 4km ride/drives, even after the rush hour. Pls. investigate. I tried booking for a Grab car (4-seater or 6-seater) or Grab taxi between 10PM (Sun) - 12AM (Mon) in a business district area. No driver accepted. Not including the failed bookings and cancelled bookings (user cancelled because it's taking too long to get a driver) makes it impossible for users to raise the issue within the app.

Name: BABY XAVIER
Comments: I booked the car for 106 bath. When car came to pick me up the price increased in your app to 162 bath. This issue was happened yesterday also. Whether the manipulation done in app or app problem. Any way it is cheating, so I wish to avoid grab app.

Name: Melissa Lee
Comments: With our little one needing a car seat, we tried to book a grabfamily twice but both times the app switched it to a grabpremium. The first time luckily the vehicle had a car seat, but the second driver didn't, just an attitude. There is no clear way to make sure the app grabs us a driver that has a car seat even when clicking grabfamily... a warning to parents with young children.

Name: Als Deutscher auf den Philippinen
Comments: No drivers available, orders always get cancelled. Over the past years GRAB has become a cesspool of unreliability! Booking is gambling as they keep you believing you get a driver before they just cancel your ride or delivery! And they literally have NO customer service anymore, only a bot to annoy you. This company should be closed and finished!
Developer_Reply: So sorry for this Grab experience. Rest assured, we are continuously working to improve our services for everyone on the platform. Thank you.

Name: DS Pinilih
Comments: very bad experience with grab mart and how they make it so difficult to contact the customer service and to communicate with driver and stores. end up losing an hour just to cancel it, without any compensation. never again
Developer_Reply: Halo Kak. Maaf ya buat engga nyaman üôá‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Apabila Kakak menemukan kendala pada penggunaan aplikasi Grab Penumpang maka silakan laporkan melalui link https://grb.to/consumeridhelpcenter agar bisa ditindaklanjuti ya.Terima kasih üôè

Name: M J
Comments: Can the app stop annoyingly changing my address each time i order food from the same place? like putting my address on basketball court or somewhere nonsensible at all. if the app is smart enough to ALWAYS CHANGE MY ADDRESS WITHOUT MY CONSENT, at least use some of that capacity to DISCERN THAT THE USER HAS A DEFAULT ADDRESS USED and TO NOT PRETEND SMART BY REASSIGNING ADDRESS TO SOME RANDOM LOCATIONS. Absolutely bogus & unacceptable!

Name: AJ Albonian
Comments: Grab is not strict with their merchants in terms of shop accessibility. It is not that shops are not accessible, it is literally the opposite of that. Shops are so accessible that even if they are closed, you can still order from them - and not know that you are waiting for an order that will never come until your driver has come to the merchant location and see their shop close. I have even experienced a driver cancel my order even if the shop was done with the order. Grab, paki-ayos naman.

Name: Sristhi
Comments: what a disapppoitment app. sadly we couldnt do anything but waited longer for help support from the Grab Center when there was multiple troubles. Grab couldnt provide a quick feedback and lead us to way longer choices. recently, i was ordering some foods and waited for 2 hours looking for drivers. it has to made me pick up my own order due to i couldnt cancel or ask for help from Grab Center.

Name: Muhammad Norizam
Comments: Worst app. When we have issue there is no way to contact support. Only auto reply that doesnt even help. No other way to contact live support. I seen other reviews many pple have this issues and they only reply that they r sorry and they r reviewing to make it better. Seems after mnths of same bad reviews by others, they dont seems to care n nothing is being done. And their food delivery is the worst. Once ordered cannot be cancelled, even if we have to wait for more than 2 hrs delay.
Developer_Reply: We apologize for any inconvenience. For swift help, please refer to our Help Centre or get in touch with us on social media.

Name: Marco
Comments: if taxi driver chats you that he/she wants to cancel the ride, you cannot press any button to notify it to Grab. You can cancel the ride by yourself but you have to pay. Or, you have to wait a lot of time that someone on the other side decides finally to cancel the ride. Not so fair.

Name: Capt 0613
Comments: Ordered twice, and after 2 hrs of waiting, no one responded to the order. And yes, I have the lastest version of the app, I canceled both two orders, they're both delayed. I hope we could be able to cancel orders when there's no rider yet. And Not WAIT FOR 2HRS and still get nothing.

Name: Jin Ser

Developer_Reply: We are sorry for any inconvenience caused. For quick assistance on this refund part, please use our Help Centre or message us on social media.

Name: JK
Comments: Their help centre and finance simply don't reply mails and messages. And it has been 9 days already. I wrote them a mail asking for payment method for the PayLater as I'm in overseas. After you made payment, you requested them to update the amount in the PayLater, they simply don't reply you despite sending so many requests to them. But they just keep sending reminders to you.
Developer_Reply: Apologies for the inconvenience. For immediate assistance, please check our Help Centre or contact us via social media.

Name: Calvin Lai

Comments: Of all my frequent usage apps, Grab is the ONE AND ONLY app i praying for a competitor replacement. (my e-hailing cost doubled within just 1yr time). A worse and never-improved app, was a 10yrs loyal customer, leaving last comment before uninstall.
Developer_Reply: Hi there, don't worry we are reviewing further for improvement always for our users. Thank you for highlighting this to us and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.

Name: Emily CJW

Name: Bimo Pangestu

Name: Mohammed Ashraf

Name: Hassan Launto
Comments: scam app, I top up my garbpay accidentally with 1K pesos yet when I'm trying to transfer or to buy load to make use of my money the app won't allow me or it always end up failing to buy load as stated by grabpay without any reason stated. don't use grab pay, Food Panda is far better! this app is not customer friend, I would like to delete this when I have my money back.

Name: Anita Kurmary
Comments: Hi I just bought Honor and downloaded GRAB. Every single place I type cannot be found, in the where to box, the common places I go to with the Grab app in my old phone, it works great on my old phone. Please help me, why is it no place can be found in the new phone.?

Name: Jetin Dhinjal
Comments: Been using grab for food deliveries and rides. Not a single problem that I had experienced. If there was an order problem they settled it with ease. Good job and thank you once again.

Name: Wayne Myers
Comments: Terrible search function. Never puts you in the right place. You can cut and paste an address from Google maps and you'll end up in a completely different place without warning.

Name: Suprayan Yapura
Comments: help center is not reliable. i had my food order cancelled by 3 drivers. the first 2 cancels were ok, till the third one, it was canceled with the reason that i couldnt be contacted. i sent chat to every of the driver to confirm my order and there was no reply from the 3rd driver. i waited for 1.5h and got canceled. great.. i had to reorder with hungry stomach and waited for another 1.5h?

Name: Behnaz Jalali
Comments: After enabling passkey a few days ago, fingerprint, facial scan, google, mobile, etc all kinds of logging authentication failed to work. I have money in my grab account geez. Why was i even logged out after my last grab booking???

Name: Glenvern Huelva
Comments: Can't cancel an order when accidentally placed. Also, grab doesn't offer you options whether you want to wait your order they just cancel it immediately when it takes too long.

Name: Meca Merin
Comments: No good e-wallet app. üëéüëéüëé No customer service provider. Can't resolve an specific issue, it's just an autobot. My money hasn't been credited on my grabpay wallet account. There was no issue on the 3rd party payment processor, except the Grab itself. I feel robbed.

Name: JD Bock
Comments: Just need to say companies like this need to be stopped by people voting with their money. They charge 30% on top of the cost of the food (either directly to the customer or to the restaurant causing them to increase their prices to offer food through the platform) plus a delivery fee plus an additional "platform" fee. It should be a flat rate per kilometer given directly to the person delivering and a max 15% of transaction to Grab. Super greedy

Name: Clark Reyes
Comments: "Only good at the beginning" intro boys The app is good for food delivery but when it comes to it's versatility of getting transportation, it did not live up to the ads and how efficient it is. Drivers tend to make you wait for 10 to 30 minutes. No replies, no effort to give an update, and no communication if they will go to you for the ride. This kept happing for the previous days. I even subscribed myself with their excellent service. Guess it was only good at the beginning.

Name: Erich Paulini
Comments: I only use the app for transport and it lacks basic functionality. No time stamp provided for booking confirmation not for tarrival of the car. This way Grab conceals when the car arrives much later than promised. Also, one can never verify whether the S$ 3.00 for waiting is in fact justified. Combine that with the fact that the app claims the transport has arrived, when, in fact, the car is still quite a stretch away. I feel taken for a ride (pun intended)!
Developer_Reply: We understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at http://m.me/Grab.

Name: Sven Fab
Comments: No top up possible with foreign credit card anymore! Next you cannot use the app at all, if you're not a local. Very disappointing development. App is OK, sometimes cluttered, sometimes lagging, but overall doing its job. Service has improved, but it depends on the country or even town. For example Malaysia is usually good, but in the Philippines and Indonesia they're already hand in hand with the taxi mafia with exorbitant pricing.

Name: Lucian Rotariu
Comments: Always sets the wrong pickup position even when I double check and then I have to sync with the driver for my correct location. If i start writing a message to the driver then quickly check my location in the app it does not retain what I've already written. Navigating the map in the app is horrible, it only gives you a small part of the screen to work with and if you miss it, it quickly return to default view.

Name: BE TN
Comments: Been using Grab for many years, lately the driver quality has gotten so bad, I have more bad experiences than good ones. Most drivers don't know how to use the app, or don't know how to use Google maps or Waze, are very difficult to deal with, or cancel so much that it's difficult ti rely on them (especially when you have been waiting for your Grab food order for an hour). Of course complaining to Grab is pointless so you're always on your own trying to deal with the problem.

Name: Benyamin Rusli
Comments: Somehow kept on asking to verify location again and again, while location access is on. I already gave you permission, do your own job. There isnt a lot of improvement to the map services for the last 5 years. My address is still not listed on the map and i have to manually chat the driver the details. The app itself is getting very slow. It is either the app being too greedy by kept on adding services / useless visual gimmick.

Name: MM MM
Comments: Highly unreliable, a chaotic system of driver assignment, the trashy version of Uber. My "Activity History" currently consists of only cancelled rides - all cancelled suddenly by the driver without a reason given, sometimes after waiting for 20min(!) because a far-away car has been assigned (rather than one of the many closer ones visible near me),and while they were only 1min away from my pickup... two key functions: reliability & getting you the fastest pickup. At both, Grab fails horribly.
Developer_Reply: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at http://m.me/Grab so that we can follow up.

Name: Manish Kumar
Comments: App assigns drivers. Drivers drive towards destination and sometimes cancel the ride abruptly after making the passenger wait for 10-15 min. No repercussions for the driver. One could have looked for alternatives if these irresponsible drivers did not want that job and told so upfront.

Name: p ma
Comments: It kept changing drivers. I was in Bangkok. The app kept changing drivers, and did not take temporary road closure in consideration. 7 minutes shown on the app for the driver to come actually took forever. A driver finally tried to pick me up after 20 minutes from my order. But he could not reach the pickup point due to road changes.

Name: georgios machanidis
Comments: nice but Costumer Service not easy to reach, i read your response sounds nice but does not solve anything , can not contact you like any other platform, just mail and slow response, sad though your product is great. Developer_Reply: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you sharing this with us! Rest assured, we are continuously working to improve our services for everyone on the platform. Make sure to look out for updates to utilize our app's features! üíö

Name: Marie Colche Martinez- Munoz
Comments: If I could give this zero stars i would, they promised me my refund in 3 days and yet its past the due date and it still isnt here. How can you charge me for a transaction that was cancelled? The order didnt even reach the kitchen yet you charged me. And the worse part is that they HAVE NO HELP AT ALL. NO AGENT TO CONTACT. DIDNT RESPOND TO A SINGLE EMAIL. WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER. Where the hell is my refund?!?!

Name: Bernadette Arenas
Comments: I have applied the P100 cashback coupon when using grab pay as the payment method. Both instances my cashbacks weren't given. They auto close your support tickets. Next time if you don't want to credit cashbacks dont give us coupons and prompts.

Name: „Åà„Çä„Åà„ÇìErien

Name: Alexander Roan
Comments: I ordered food on grab (around 480 thb) and it wasn't delivered. The restaurant was about 4km away. Name: Rio Bhell Caringal

Comments: Used to be a great competitor in the online taxi/delivery service space. Normal tier for food delivery now does double order, so you might as well choose the "SAVER" option all the time. It is not worth it to pay more for basically the same service. 3. If only google review have no words cap...

Name: James Kim
Comments: As a foreigner, you'll need to have local currency cash because the app is incapable of accepting foreign credit cards. You can till order and pay cash to the delivery man. Extremely inconvenient. I am extremely upset about the card payment. I paid 20 usd to order 5 usd worth of food for the delivery man's troubles with a first time app user/foreigner. Extremely upset.

Name: Nick
Comments: Got charged because I was late to board the car. The waiting time for driver to wait for the customer is 5 minutes, yet I have waited over 15 minutes and the app says "arrive in 8 minutes" on most of my trip. So I ordered early and the rider is here just because he just finished his ride on the same location. pay me for wasting my time. Update on June 23, driver cancelled my ride but the app didn't update me and I waited more than 20 minutes just to board the car. 1 year now nothing and changed
Developer_Reply: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at http://m.me/Grab so that we can follow up.

Name: Ces Batestil

Issues was marked as "Resolved" from the Driver App and told to back to the FAQ by a CS to a website from the year 2020. I have to find other alternatives to cover my vehicle rental for this hassle.

Comments: Original rating of this app is 5 star before but not anymore. Grab Air keeps on getting being requested by drivers to be cancelled due to very low rate. Name: Shamsina Sabdin
Comments: Several times now I am unable to upload pictures to report wrong items delivered. Normally I would not mind but the items delivered are lower priced, meaning I paid more. Name: Alec Williams
Comments: You cannot contact customer service at all. If you do the phone system ops out and then hangs up on you. They are putting way too much on drivers my food was picked up and then delivered 2 hours later due to them having to deliver other orders when trying to report I kept hitting a wall

Comments: Not recommended to use this app for food delivery. Made us wait for 2 HOURS only to cancel the order! Imagine how hungry we all were! Better to use Shopeefood.

Name: Muhammad Hazim

Name: Alex Thong

Developer_Reply: We are truly sorry to hear about your negative experience with our refund policy and any frustration it has caused. That is not the service we aim to provide. Developer_Reply: Please accept our sincere apologies. Moving forward should you encountered the same issue with your GrabFood order, please contact us at http://m.me/Grab so that we can have a look into this right away, thank you.

Name: Toh Yun Jie, Jabez
Comments: I have submitted a issues through grab app since 6 days ago and again queried about the status 4 days ago. Until today nobody replied me. I am going circle and circle and nobody can resolve my issues. Very poor service.
Developer_Reply: We truly regret any inconvenience this has caused you. Please reach out to us via the Help Centre or our official social media platforms, and we promise to resolve it quickly.

Name: Jessie Hsieh

Name: Mirabelle Lee
Comments: customer service is useless, and cannot cancel my order even when it meets the requirements (no driver assigned, order hasnt started preparing). tried calling the store but they cannot cancel on their end, then tried finding hotline. Developer_Reply: Hi there, thanks for sharing your concern with us, rest assured that we are reviewing further for improvement. Thank you for highlighting this to us and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.

Name: Nicholas Torok Hobson
Comments: Absolutely abysmal customer service experience and faulty app design. Despite explicit delivery instructions driver delivered to a map pin randomly generated by the app that wasn't even visible to the user until delivery had started. Customer service was unhelpful, repeatedly sending auto generated messages and refused to acknowledge this fault or refund despite my food being somewhere on the other side of Kuala Lumpur. Do not use this app.

Name: Raexna Ragnvindr
Comments: UPDATE: Still the same issue hard to reach customer service. Everything is in an FAQs which doesn't even help with my case.I filled out a form and they just closed the ticket without any updates at all. FOR THOSE WHO USE INTERNATIONAL CARDS THINK BEFORE YOU USE YOUR CARDS they are hard to reach especially if there is a double charge issue.
Developer_Reply: Hi there, we'd love to help you! Please reach out to us via the Help Centre or our social media platforms with the screenshot of the error so we can look into it.

Name: Grant Veil
Comments: support are very unhelpful. Only one issue, you couldn't resolve it. Been using this almost everyday for my foods, but everyday has always been disappointing as well. Tried your help centre, and it's all automated responses, can't even help a basic concern.

Name: RKKK K
Comments: The map is so tiny and always blocked by ad. and other information in lower half of the screen. Plus it always zoom out and move itself so quickly so i was not able to see the details of the map. Wish we had Uber in Philippines.

Name: Rosdi Kasim
Comments: It resets your shopping cart after a few minutes. I was adding items to cart when it says I have been idle too long. Then it removes everything in the cart. This happens twice! I gives up. Guess I'll be going to giant today to buy groceries.

Name: Mateo Fernandez (MatMatArtist)

Now I am stuck waiting for nothing and I can't cancel!

Name: Jerome Ley

Once, I noticed that it was in the wrong address, so i changed it to home, when I ordered it, it reverted back to the wrong address again. I had to drive there to get my food.

Name: Belinda Elio
Comments: The payment hold is a big inconvenience for customers. Grab should only deduct the amount if the booking is successful and completed. There‚Äôs no way to speak with a live agent, just an annoying bot that repeats scripts and suggests irrelevant answers to your concerns.

Name: Ian Agoncillo
Comments: customer support is just ai. you can't expect immediate help. and when you really need to cancel an order (e.g., driver maxed out on cancels, can't contact merchant, order taking too long) you can't anymore. had an altercation with a driver simply because he's forcing me to cancel and i can't and he can't and the merchant can't.

Name: Chips More
Comments: The app keep repeating login info for online banking when I try to topup. Happened a lot. Other apps will take us direct to customer service representative if we ask different question, but this apps dont. I am so upset. Help centre is not a help at all. Not user friendly. I keep repeating telling the issue several times.

Name: Ricky Suen
Comments: I always take Grab car to go home from my work place and the fare is always between $15-18. If weekend could be up to $30 and that's normal. But somehow i was charged $26.73 on Monday night. The price range showed on app was $16-22. Ridiculous price and the customer support doesn't take my case seriously. Very disappointing for this app.

Name: Yuga Onchou

They can make you wait an hour or more only to cancel your order with no explaination or when they do, sometimes it's because it's not available but they already made you starve. You get nothing as compensation too. Philippine Customer service at its finest
Developer_Reply: Hi! So sorry for this booking experience üôè We're asking for your patience as some merchants might be busy today due to high demand. We ask for your patience in the meantime üôèÔ∏è

Name: Sebastian Griesing
Comments: Terrible experience. Ordered food at a store in Bali. Waiting for one hour get the message that drivers can't be found, because no driver accepts cash, they suggest me to go cashless. My card is being declined. No idea why. Now waiting for two hours looking for drivers. Unable to cancel the order. What a horrible, horrible app.

Name: Victor A. Kho III
Comments: You keep on getting the money from our e-wallet even before a booking has been confirmed. If the driver cancels, it takes a long time before the money comes back. I have an active issue about this and no one's assisting me with it.

Name: Saurabh Gupta

Again when I booked grab for airport it showed 25-32 SGD range but then charged 43 SGD. I will never recommend this app to anyone.

Name: magnus
Comments: Prices already so expensive, now I can't even get refund for food that i didn't receive??? Grabfood driver ran off with my food and i never received a refund because they 'attempted to contact me' and their 'attempt' is leaving messages hidden in the app instead of just calling me. Name: SuperBoii

Name: Ben Finn
Comments: The company gives such disrespect. Don't use them in BKK airport (probably others too). The system is designed to not care about the passengers time. I get you do t want to waste drivers time but you choose to flip the bird to your passengers rather than figure out a balance? The minute there is an alternative I'm deleting the app

Name: Chongy Kong
Comments: Grab food: Doesn't make sense when there is no rider around, the delivery keeps delaying indefinitely until a rider is found. Pay to starve? My food is delayed 2hours. What nonsense.

Name: Wan Ahmad Hamdan

Other user -> please go to shopee food, its much better.
Developer_Reply: Hi Wan, we will get this check for you on this order issue. Please reach out to us via HelpCentre or our official Twitter or Facebook page so we can get this sorted out for you? As we can directly check on it.

Name: Brian Quah
Comments: 1. False advertising and very shady company - Grab always finds new ways to cheat you of your money and expire your points with so-called 'gamification' - Lost over 30k points this way. 2. Name: Angry Bird (Angie)
Comments: The grab now getting worst. Cannot cancel the food order... Name: Mica

Name: Ashwin Gopaul
Comments: The app is very good but the experience I had with the driver who came to fetch me was terrible. I was going to the airport with my wife and 1 year old son. There was no car seat even when we mentioned. The driver has put the aircond full blast and I had to ask him 3 times to increase the temperature because of my son. But it was too late my son caught a cold. I was going on holiday and unfortunately we ended up staying in the hotel during our vacation and look after my son. Terrible experience.

Name: Rookie Cookie
Comments: Since youre big and have low competition in certain countries, you easily dont want ensure the quality of some of your app's functionality especially the driver's ETA. The driver arrived 30 minutes later when your app told me it's only 14 minutes. You wont even let me change the driver without charging me extra. What a scam.

Name: anonymous
Comments: I don't trust this app's security, especially regarding what information the delivery food riders obtain concerning their users. Finally, I don't appreciate how this app uses personalization to determine what restaurant or grocery mart to recommend. But I know you can't fix this, so don't bother.

Name: Aluk Thien
Comments: I dont know how grab calculate the rate, but its very stupid. And thats the reason why i am no longer subscribe and using your service. Car ride, Maxim is way cheaper. Rank up the price again, you will lose a lot more customers. Even your riders are complaining a lot nowadays because of your money hungry.

Name: Sultan Firaun

Name: Am.

Name: Yanisa Trisak

Name: tee tc
Comments: Firstly I'm happy when the price was reduced so much. But after that I noticed that drivers keep cancel my order. And the driver said: The fare is too low, driver can't cover their cost, then they rather to cancel the order instead of accept your order. Grab company should do something about this, else you will lose more clients and drivers

Name: Zulfadli
Comments: [ALERT!] Drivers often do not come after the orders are made and the balance is deducted. He probably hoped that I would cancel the order, but in the end he canceled the order himself after getting tired of going around. When I contacted CS to report the problem,Grab formally refused to communicate and closed the complaint ticket without any responsibility. A real fraudulent practice! BE CAREFUL!

Name: Louise
Comments: 50 minutes into placing an order and still no driver accepted and it is not in the kitchen and it does not even have the option to cancel the order. The chat support is useless too! All it does is provide unhelpful scripts! You gotta be able to cancel your order after 10 mins of no driver accepting it!

Name: Nest Account
Comments: Super buggy Constantly opening and closing. Way too many popups for other Grab services that makes the user interface confusing. And since the driver showed up in a normal taxi anyway, I'll just stick to using a taxi instead.

Name: Danabalan Kanesathasan
Comments: "Extremely disappointed with Grab Food Service. I waited over an hour for my food, and it never arrived. To make matters worse, there was no option to cancel the order. It's incredibly frustrating to deal with such poor service when you're hungry and relying on timely delivery. The delay and lack of proper customer support are unacceptable. This is absolutely rude and unprofessional. I expect much better from a platform like Grab. This experience has been nothing but a huge letdown.

Name: Jason Jones
Comments: My wife booked a grab car to get home. The car was a taxi driver and he picked up someone else then marked us as in the car. He continued driving even though my wife called and said we are not in the car. We never got picked up and he wouldn't compete the ride. That was last week and customer support has still not gotten our money back to us. As soon as there is another app to compete, I will switch to that. Customer support is non-existent. I would give 0 stars if I could.

Name: Llyod Jonathan Dee Blando
Comments: The new update in cancellation is terrible. We experience orders taking more than 1 hour and can't cancel it. There are also times that the orders took 3hrs and still can't cancel so we have to personally contact merchants which says they too can't cancel the order.

Name: Irfan Nordin

We called customer service, but they were not able to explain the problem nor resolve it. It's absolutely ridiculous.

Name: Ellah Tulabot
Comments: It cancels food orders. We waited so long for the order for it to only be canceled after waiting for about 1 hour and 30 minutes. Would not recomend for food orders just use the other pink app insteadüòí. Very unsatisfactory.

Name: Arch Construct
